35 <sourceDesc>
. <listWit>
. <witness xml:id="A">
. <abbr type="siglum">A</abbr>
. <msDesc>
40 <msIdentifier>
. <settlement>Jakarta</settlement>
. <institution>Perpustakaan Nasional Republik Indonesia</institution>
. <collection>Lontar</collection>
. <idno>L. 621</idno>
45 </msIdentifier>
. <physDesc>
. <objectDesc>
. <p>This manuscript consists of 36 folios of <foreign>lontar</foreign> leaves, each measuring 34.3 × 3 cm, four lines per folio. The sequential order of the folios has been disturbed. The foliation, running from 1 to 34, is indicated by Old Sundanese numerals placed in the left margin on the verso side. The state of preservation of this manuscript is relatively good, although it contains two cracked leaves.</p>
. </objectDesc>
50 <handDesc>
. <handNote xml:id="SMGA_H1" scriptRef="class:57470 maturity:83215">
. <p>A significant palaeographic feature in this manuscript is that use of <foreign>panolong</foreign> (vocalization o) is extremely rare. The scribe rather tends to use the <foreign>pasangan va</foreign>. Thus we find words spelled <foreign>bvagvah</foreign> instead of <foreign>bogoh</foreign> ‘like to’, <foreign>bvaraṅ</foreign> instead of <foreign>boraṅ</foreign> ‘fear’, <foreign>cvacvaoan</foreign> instead of <foreign>cocooan</foreign> ‘livestock’, and many other examples.</p>
. </handNote>
. </handDesc>
55 </physDesc>
. <history>
. <p>This manuscript comes from Bandung and was given by the regent of Bandung, R.A.A. Wiranatakusumah IV circa 1875 (ROD 1914: 41; cf. Munawar Holil &amp; Aditia Gunawan 2010).</p>
. </history>
. </msDesc>
60 </witness>
. <witness xml:id="B">
. <abbr type="siglum">B</abbr>
. <msDesc>
. <msIdentifier>
65 <settlement>Garut, West Java</settlement>
. <institution>Ciburuy Hermitage</institution>
. <collection>Lontar</collection>
. <idno>Kropak 26 peti 1c</idno>
. </msIdentifier>
70 <physDesc>
. <objectDesc>
. <p>This manuscript consists of thirty-five <foreign>lontar</foreign>s measuring 26 × 3 cm, four lines per folio. The majority of the folios are damaged.</p>
. </objectDesc>
. <handDesc>
75 <handNote xml:id="SMGB_H1" scriptRef="class:57470 maturity:83215">
. <p>Written in Old Sundanese script.</p>
. <p>A rather unusual feature is the use of <foreign>pasangan</foreign>s such as <foreign>ba</foreign>, <foreign>ma</foreign>, and <foreign>sa</foreign> which are rarely found in the manuscripts written in Old Sundanese script.</p>
. </handNote>
. </handDesc>
80 </physDesc>
. </msDesc>
. </witness>
. </listWit>
. </sourceDesc>
85 </fileDesc>
. <encodingDesc>

. </p>

. <text xml:space="preserve">
. <body><div type="edition" xml:lang="osn-Latn">
115 <div type="chapter" n="1" xml:id="smg_01">
. <head type="editorial">Five Knowledges (<foreign>pañca-vedani</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_01.01"><pb edRef="#A" n="1v"/><app><lem wit="#A">ndəh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> sasana mahaguru ṅaran saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pustaka, sasana ma ṅaranya urut nu ti həla, maha ma nu ləvih ti ləvih ti na dunya, guru ma ṅaranna puhun ikaṅ rat kabeh.</p>
120<p xml:id="smg_01.02">hana upadyanta
. <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyiganiṁ</rdg></app> manik anarga, lavan manik
. <app><lem type="emn">sarvesta</lem><rdg wit="#A">savesṭā</rdg></app>, yeka puhuniṅ suka duka, hala hayu, byaktanya nihan,
. <app><lem type="emn">buh</lem><rdg wit="#A">bvaḥ</rdg></app> paksa, huniṅ təmən, daek mo kapalaṅ.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_01.03">kaliṅanya,
125 <app><lem type="emn">buh</lem><rdg wit="#A">bvaḥ</rdg></app> ma saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> prativi, basana dipahayu, diturunkən, ditaekkən, dicamahan, dicampuran, hantə susut hantə
. <app><lem type="norm">punduṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">puduṁ</rdg></app>, hantə gərah hantə bijah, kədə
. <app><lem type="emn">dəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">dəṁdeṅ</rdg></app> laṅgəṅ ṅavakan na kaprativian, iya keh eta na avakənən saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_01.04">paksa ma cai, alaənana ma, basana
130 <app><lem type="emn">bijil</lem><rdg wit="#A">bijiḥl</rdg></app> ti huluna, teka bvar heraṅ tiis
. <app><lem type="emn">rasana</lem><rdg wit="#A">rasna</rdg></app>, gəs ma hantə kavuruṅan, təka ri sagara, sa<pb edRef="#A" n="2r"/>kitu na turutanən saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_01.05">huniṅ ma ṅaran aṅin, alaənana ma, basana mətu ti barat, teka hir tiis, lələs dataṅna ka avak uraṅ, gəs ma hantə kavuruṅanan, basana bijil mədəṅ di bvana, sakitu na turutanən, ku saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_01.06">təmən ta ma ṅaraniṅ apuy dəṅən gagaman, ti iña eta dipipakənakən ku nu reya, ku
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəIna</rdg></app> təmən.</p>
135<p xml:id="smg_01.07">daek
. <app><lem type="emn">eta</lem><rdg wit="#A">Eka</rdg><!-- similar aksara --></app> ma ṅaranya, saṅ hyaṅ aditiya, basana mətu ti vetan, hantə kavuruṅanan ku mega, ku hujan,
. <app><lem type="emn">ku kukus</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="haplography">kukus·</rdg></app>, ku saṅhub, təka ri kulon, ku
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəI</rdg></app> eka laksana, kitu keh na turutanən, ku saṅ sevaka darma, mulah mva iyatna-yatna di saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pasaṅkanan, nihan
140 <app><lem type="norm">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">sinaguḥ</rdg></app> pañca-vedani ṅaranya, pañca <pb edRef="#A" n="2v"/>ma vatək lima, ve ma cai, dani ma sapu ñere.
.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="2" xml:id="smg_02">
.<head type="editorial">Three Types of Precepts</head>
145<p xml:id="smg_02.01">ini siksa
. <app><lem type="norm">kandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadaṁ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, siksa kuruṅ, siksa dapur, kaliṅanya, na siksa
. <app><lem type="emn">kandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kudaṁ</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, sakuliliṅ sarira,
. <app><lem type="norm">jəṅjəəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">jəjəqəṁ</rdg></app> ma na halvaan, halvaan si paṅhavanan, na si paṅluṅguhan, iña eta na iṅətkənən dəṅ uraṅ, maka iyatna-yatna, sugan uraṅ asup təpas, asup daləm,
. <app><lem type="emn">hantə</lem><rdg wit="#A">hanti</rdg></app> ṅənah lamun hantə dayəhanana, ya siksa kandaṅ ṅaranna.</p>
150<p xml:id="smg_02.02">masa uraṅ paparan, hantə ṅənah palar
. <app><lem type="emn">cidəra</lem><rdg wit="#A">cidri</rdg></app> ku paṅəsi huma sakalih, ku paṅəsi kəbvan sakalih, maṅkaṅuni hiris
. <app><lem type="emn">məbət</lem><rdg wit="#A">məbit</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">cəli</lem><rdg wit="#A">cili</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">lamun</lem><rdg wit="#A">laman</rdg></app> kacaṅ məbət taraṅ, ṅala
155 <app><lem type="norm">tunda</lem><rdg wit="#A">tuda</rdg></app> ṅala
. <app><lem type="norm">kantənan</lem><rdg wit="#A">katənan</rdg></app>, nurunkən sadapan sakalih, hantə ṅənah ṅisiṅ di
. <app><lem type="norm">piṅgir</lem><rdg wit="#A">pigir</rdg></app> jalan, sugan
. <app><lem type="norm">kaambə</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaabə</rdg></app> ku nu buṅah-baṅah, bisi kasumpah
. <app><lem type="emn">kapadahkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapadakən·</rdg></app>, ambu,<pb edRef="#A" n="3r"/> ayah, paṅguruan, mulah mo make
160 <app><lem type="emn">caṅcut</lem><rdg wit="#A">caṁcuta</rdg></app> paṅadua, sugan uraṅ pajəəṅ dəṅ gusti dəṅ mantri, mulah mo ṅidal,
. <app><lem type="emn">paṅadoṅkoṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṁṅadvakvakvakən·</rdg></app>, ya siksa
. <app><lem type="norm">kandaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadaṁ</rdg></app> ṅaranya.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_02.03">siksa kuruṅ ma, sakarma dəṅ saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">pandita</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip">panta</rdg></app>,
165 <app><lem type="norm">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A">Agəs</rdg></app> ma hantə ṅənah ṅarəsəh bənaṅ dihəəm, ṅarumpak saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> siksa, lamun
. <app><lem type="norm">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A">Agəs</rdg></app> ñaho di vuku-vuku di na ləkər-ləkər, daṅda-daṅdi<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sipat<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> galəṅ,
. <app><lem type="emn">paṅguratan</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṁgurattən·</rdg></app>, paṅguritan, paṅvaləran, paṅvatəsan, satapak
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> brahma visnu, basa ṅavatəsan bvana, ya ta siksa kuruṅ ṅaranya.</p>
170<p xml:id="smg_02.04">na siksa dapur ma ṅaranna, ṅadapətkən puhun, ṅahusir taṅkal ku
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəI</rdg></app> na bakti satiya, di saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">pandita</lem><rdg wit="#A">pandata</rdg></app>, ya siksa dapur ṅaranna, nihan sinaṅguh siksa kandaṅ ṅaranya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> liṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">mahapandita</lem><rdg wit="#A">maḥhapandata</rdg></app>.</p>
.</div>
175<div type="chapter" n="3" xml:id="smg_03">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Advancements (<foreign>dasa-vrədi</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.01">niha<pb edRef="#A" n="3v"/>n kayatna-yatna saṅ sevaka darma, pavuitan saṅ hyaṅ sastra, mala-murtinya ṅuni, katəkan maṅke.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.02">ndah ta pavuitan saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> sastra, nihan
180 <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvarnya</rdg></app>, sasurup saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> srivaraditya, gumənti saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">ratri</lem><rdg wit="#A">ratsi</rdg><!-- cause: similar --></app>, trəpti-trəptva pagave
. <app><lem type="emn">vesalaksana</lem><rdg wit="#A">vevalaksana</rdg><!-- cause: similar --></app>, tatva kala batari durgi,
. <app><lem type="norm">aṅrəguṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">AR̥gu</rdg></app> ta jantra
185 <app><lem type="norm">sri</lem><rdg wit="#A">sra</rdg></app> batara gana, sinamburatakən ri manusa madyapada, matəmahan ta ya gəbaṅ lavan
. <app><lem type="norm">lontar</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvatar</rdg></app>, tipuk divasa pupus gəbaṅ lavan
. <app><lem type="norm">lontar</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvatar</rdg></app>, tinut pinada pada, lvane lavan davane, tinitisan asta gaṅga vira tanu.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.03">apa ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem type="conj">asta</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> gaṅga vira tanu, asta ṅaraniṅ taṅan, gaṅga ṅaraniṅ bañu, vira ta ṅaraniṅ
190 <app><lem type="emn">panurat</lem><rdg wit="#A">parurat</rdg><!-- similar --> </app> lavan panuli, tanu ṅaraniṅ maṅsi, tinulis de saṅ pandita, pinaca de saṅ apuṅguṅ <pb edRef="#A" n="4r"/> tambah uni unine, vinaləran de saṅ kavi.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.04">ṅuniveh cinaritakən ta dasa-purva, oṅ sarasvati tara-jñana cintamanik, kalunaṅ mataniṅ bayu, pamurtyan batara guru, batara saṅ sida
. <app><lem type="emn">panditatita</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip">pantatita</rdg></app> ri ləmah, saṅ sida
. <app><lem type="emn">panditatita</lem><rdg wit="#A">pandatatita</rdg></app> riṅ laṅit, kusika, garga, mestri, purusya, patañjala, mvaṅ bayu sabda hdap, ṅuniveh ikaṅ saṅ manon, apan saṅ hyaṅ ituṅ ika.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.05">nihan sinaṅguh dasa-purva ṅaranya, dasa ta ma nu sapuluh, purva ma na puhun, kayatnakən saṅ sevaka darma, liṅ saṅ
195 <app><lem type="emn">pandita</lem><rdg wit="#A">pandata</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_03.06">rəp dəm<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem type="emn">anuvartakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">anuvaḥtakən·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">samijilnikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">samjəl·nikaṁ</rdg></app> carita, humənəṅ na rasa saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tuṅgal, na naha nu dimantraan eta, ah kena karah
200 <app><lem type="norm">aiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">AI</rdg></app> ñaho dek mijilkən aksara, sastra muṅgu di na omas, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ salaka, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">tambaga</lem><rdg wit="#A">tabaga</rdg></app>, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅ<pb edRef="#A" n="4v"/>gu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ cudiga, sastra
205 <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ bəsi, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ batu, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ paduṅ, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ pəjva, sastra muṅgu riṅ taal, sastra
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ gəbaṅ.</p>
210<p xml:id="smg_03.07"><app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ omas, diṅaranan prəmita mirah kañcana, hade rua hade gəsna, kena sui
. <app><lem type="norm">ditəndənan</lem><rdg wit="#A">ditdənan·</rdg></app> diña, sugan mo reya na ñaho, ña mana diturunkən dəi,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ salaka, diṅaranan ta ya kanaka, diturunkən
215 <app><lem type="emn">dəi</lem><rdg wit="#A">diI</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> di na
. <app><lem type="norm">tambaga</lem><rdg wit="#A">tabaga</rdg></app>, diṅaranan ta ya paripid, diturunkən dəi,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
220 <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ cudiga<!-- cudiga or cundiga? -->, diṅaranan ta ya prəka, diturunkən dəi,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ bəsi, diṅaranan ta ya gotraka, diturunkən dəi,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ batu, diṅaranan ta ya tras pati, diturunkən dəi,
225 <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ paduṅ, diṅaranan ta ya salə, diturunkən dəi,
. <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ pəjva, diṅarana<pb edRef="#A" n="5r"/>n ta ya ləpihan, sui
. <app><lem type="norm">ditəndən</lem><rdg wit="#A">ditdən·</rdg></app> diña bisina bəki vahya, diturunkən dəi,
230 <app><lem type="emn">sastra</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṭā</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">muṅgu</lem><rdg wit="#A">mugu</rdg></app> riṅ taal, diṅaranan ta ya carik, aya eta mənaṅ utama, kenana lain pikabuyutanən, diturunkən dəi, sastra muṅgu riṅ gəbaṅ, diṅaranan ta ya cəməṅ, ini ma iña pikabuyutanən, ṅaranna saṅ hyaṅ ripta, ya sunya, ya ləpihan, ya mastra, ya
. <app><lem type="emn">lepa</lem><rdg wit="#A">lepva</rdg></app>-karana, iya pustaka katuṅgalanana, nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">siguḥ</rdg></app> dasa-vrədi ṅaranya.</p>
. </div>
235<div type="chapter" n="4" xml:id="smg_04">
. <head type="editorial">Three Defects (<foreign>tri-mala</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.01">carekna saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tuṅgal, na naha piənanana<!-- kata luar biasa! piən = peruntukan irealis?-->, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pustaka ini, kena karah aiṅ dek
240 <app><lem type="emn">ṅabijilkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅabjal·kən·</rdg></app> carita, mətuna saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> siksa guru, ti saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> siksa.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.02">ndəh nihan saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tri-kaya
245 <app><lem type="norm">mandala</lem><rdg wit="#A">madala</rdg></app> parisuda
. <app><lem type="conj">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅaranya, trika Ø</rdg></app>, ini ma na timpalkənən, mulah dek
. <app><lem type="emn">mitəmən</lem><rdg wit="#A">mətəmən</rdg></app> iña saṅ sevaka darma, na puhun avah-avuh, taṅkalniṅ<pb edRef="#A" n="5v"/> papa kalesa, vvitniṅ kaliyuga, hetuniṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">papa naraka</lem><rdg wit="#A">papaniṁraka</rdg></app>, ṅaranna, tri-mala.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.03">guna, nihan lvirnya, ika sinaṅguh tri-mala ṅaraniya,
250 <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyiganiṁ</rdg></app> gaṅsa lavan malam, tambaga lavan timah, apa ta
. <app><lem type="norm">yaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">yakən</rdg></app> tambaga lavan
. <app><lem wit="#A">timah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>mah</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">kaliṅanya na tri-dusta</lem><rdg wit="#A">niṁkaṁ tri-dusta</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj">sabda tan yukti</lem><rdg wit="#A #B" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ulah tan yukti,
255 <app><lem wit="#A">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ambə</rdg></app> tan yukti, ginavayakən
. <app><lem wit="#A">sabda mahala</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, ulah
. <app><lem wit="#A">mahala, ambək</lem><rdg wit="#B">mahala<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> mahala.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.04">ini byaktana ulah mahala, notok, mokol, nəvək, mərəp,
. <app><lem type="norm">ṅadədəl, noñjok</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅadədəl, nvajvak·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nojvak·</rdg></app>,
260 <app><lem type="emn">ñaketrok</lem><rdg wit="#A">ñaketrva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ñakətok·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nampar</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">ṅajam·bak</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">nampelaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">napelaṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sakvehniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakvaḥniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sakvoḥni</rdg></app> ləkas taṅan, ya ulah mahala ṅaranya.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.05"><app><lem wit="#A">sabda</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> mahala ṅaranna, toroṅ gasoṅ tan pakarana,
265 <app><lem type="emn">campəlak</lem><rdg wit="#A">camp<unclear>ə</unclear>k·</rdg></app> sabda, ñumpah<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> madahkən, ṅadudu<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> nəluh<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅupat guru</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>guru</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sakvehniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakvaḥniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sakoEḥ</rdg></app> sabda tan yukti, ya sabda mahala ṅaraniya.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_04.06">ambək mahala ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya, kira-kira</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅaranya, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> budi-budi, ṅajərum, ṅagunaan,
270 <app><lem type="emn">mijahəta<pb edRef="#A" n="6r"/>n</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">mijahətatan·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">ṅanəluh</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅaniluḥ</rdg></app>, ṅaracun, hiri payogya, aṅgəs ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">numpu, maliṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>samaliṁ</rdg></app>, papañjiṅan, meor, ṅahadaṅ, siṅ savatək tan yogya, dipitvah
. <app><lem wit="#A">dipihədap</lem><rdg wit="#B">dipihə<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ya eta
. <app><lem type="emn">ambək</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambhə</rdg></app> mahala, ya ta sinaṅguh tri-mala ṅaranya.</p>
275<p xml:id="smg_04.07">nihan sinaṅguh tri-mala
. <app><lem wit="#A">visesa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>sesa</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hana ya di saṅ prabu, rama, rəsi,
. <app><lem wit="#B">disi</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> mvaṅ tarahan, ini
. <app><lem wit="#A">byaktana, aya</lem><rdg wit="#B">byaktana, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ta kajəəṅ nu duka, dijual,
. <app><lem type="emn">dihulunkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">dihulun:akən·</rdg></app>, dirampas<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
280 <app><lem type="emn">dipaehan</lem><rdg wit="#A">dipiḥEḥhan</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#A">pañca-kapataka</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ñca-kapataka</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#B">samaṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#B">tri-mala</lem><rdg wit="#A">trima</rdg></app> visesa ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita, <num value="3">3</num>.</p>
.</div>
285<div type="chapter" n="5" xml:id="smg_05">
. <head type="editorial">Ten Defilements (<foreign>dasa-kalesa</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_05.01">nihan
. <app><lem wit="#A">muvah</lem><rdg wit="#B">ta<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kayatna-yatnakna saṅ sevaka darma, ana ta dasa-kalesa ṅaranya, apa
. <app><lem wit="#A">byaktanya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ya</rdg></app>, nihan silokanya,
290 <app><lem type="emn">ndəh</lem><rdg wit="#A">ndiḥ</rdg></app> nihan yuktinya,</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="smg_05.02" xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="1">vigataḥ <app><lem type="conj">kleśapāpe ’smin</lem><rdg wit="#A">kəlesa seman·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kalesa sagapesomən</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="2">vigatah <app><lem type="conj">maladuhkhinaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">maladuknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ma<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,</l>
295 <l n="3">kurvanti kuśalam mahat.</l>
. </lg>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_05.03">ka<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> vənaṅa ta kita,
. <app><lem type="emn">sumudakən ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">sumidakən· ta</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>taṁ</rdg></app> dasa-ka<pb edRef="#A" n="6v"/>lesa, yan dataṅ ri kita, nya <term xml:lang="san-Latn">doṣa</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">moha</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">lobha</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">məta</term>,
300 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">matsārya</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">macarrya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">macaryi</rdg></app>, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">abhimāna</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambimana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">A<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">mūrkha</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kuhaka</term>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">sambhinnapralāpa</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sabimana, prəlapa</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">peśuna</term>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_09.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_09.01">SiGu 9.1</ref>: <foreign>kaliṅanya vənaṅa ta śumuddhakən taṅ daśakleśa, yar dataṅ ri kita, nyaṅ doṣa, moha, drəmba, lobha, mātsarya, abhimāna, mūrkha, kuhaka, sambhinnapralāpa, peśuna</foreign>.</note>
305 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_05.04">ka, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">doṣa</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">puji-puji suka</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical"><lacunaEnd/>puji kukuḥ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">puji-puji</lem><rdg wit="#A">puji</rdg></app> vihikan, puji-puji
310 <app><lem type="norm">virya</lem><rdg wit="#A">parya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">viryi</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh <term xml:lang="san-Latn">doṣa</term>, ṅa,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">moha</lem><rdg wit="#B">dəm·ba</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">tan sih</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ana ta<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ri padanya janma,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">lobha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">dəmbha</rdg></app> ṅaranya, bəki ñatu, bəki ṅinum, bogoh hees,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hantə dek</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>dek·</rdg></app> mitinəṅkən pirampesən, ya ta sinaṅguh
315 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">lobha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">d</add>im·ba</rdg><rdg wit="#B">dəm·ba</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">reya nu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> dipitinəṅ, dipituah,
. <app><lem wit="#A">dipikarma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, iya <term xml:lang="san-Latn">lobha</term> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">məta</term> ṅaranya, teka ivuh ku
. <app><lem type="norm">kabəṅharanana</lem><rdg wit="#A">kabəharranana</rdg></app>, ivuh
. <app><lem type="conj">ku</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> kavijaksanaanana, ivuh ku kagunaanana, ivuh
320 <app><lem wit="#A">ku kañahona</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> bənana ṅañahvakən·</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh <term xml:lang="san-Latn">məta</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">matsārya</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">macarya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">macaryi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ṅa</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, timburuan
. <app><lem wit="#B">manon</lem><rdg wit="#A">manva</rdg></app> rahayu, ñəəṅ nu
. <app><lem wit="#A">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B">ra<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> timburu, ñəəṅ nu suka timburu, ya ta
325 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">matsārya</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">mañcanyi</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn">abhimāna</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambimana</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hamo dek ñik<pb edRef="#A" n="7r"/>sa mitutur, ya <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">abhimāna</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Ambhəmana</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>habimanaṁ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">mūrkha</term> ṅaranya, hantə dek
. <app><lem wit="#A">nututurkən</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">nurut· carek·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">induṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Iduṁ</rdg></app> bapa, paṅguruan, ya ta
. <app><lem wit="#A">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">sinaṁ<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
330 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">mūrkha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">marka</rdg></app> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kuhaka</term> ṅaranya, <app><lem type="norm">añəṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">Añəguḥ</rdg></app><!-- Kata ini merupakan contoh bagaimana sistem nasalisasi dalam SdK diterapkan, sementara secara morfologis masih bersifat Jawa Kuno --> pagaməl nu reya,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">sambhinnapralāpa</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sabinaprəlapa</rdg></app> ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅamaṅke-maṅke</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅamaṁke-make</rdg></app> di na boganiṅ ṅaboga, di na
. <app><lem type="norm">bəṅharniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">bəharniṁ</rdg></app> kabəṅharan, ya ta
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">sambhinnapralāpa</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sambinaprəlapa</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
335 <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">peśuna</lem><rdg wit="#B">pe<lacunaStart/></rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, bogoh timburuan, bogoh mijəruman, aṅadu-ṅadu, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-<app><lem wit="#A">kalesa ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>s:a, ṅa</rdg></app>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_09.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_09.02">SiGu 9.2</ref>: <foreign>ka, ḍosa, ṅa, puji-puji sukha, puji-puji vihikan, puji-puji vīrya, ya sinaṅguḥ doṣa, ṅa, moha ṅaranya, tan pagavaya sih ri paḍanya janma, jənəkiṅ paṅan inum bvat turu, tan akiṅkin hitāvasānaniṅ janma, ya drəmba, ṅa, lobha ṅaranya, kveh ulah tar sopacara, mātsarya, ṅa, timburu manon rahayu, abhimāna, ṅa, barya tamtam, mūrkha, ṅa, tar kolih ri viśeṣaniṅ janma, kuhaka, ṅa, aṅaku-akuniṅ aguṇa, sambhinnapralāpa, ṅa, aṅayam-ayam dr̥byaniṅ adr̥bya, mvaṅ śukhaniṅ asukha, peśuna, ṅa, bvat maṅjərum, ya ta sinaṅguh daśakleśa, ṅa, babadan hilaṅakna, ikaṅ kleśa maṅkana.</foreign></note>
. </app>
340 </listApp>
.
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="6" xml:id="smg_06">
. <head type="editorial">Ten Defects (<foreign>dasa-mala</foreign>)</head>
345<p xml:id="smg_06.01">nihan ta muvah sinaṅguh dasa-mala ṅaranya, nihan silokanya.</p>
.
.<lg xml:id="smg_06.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="anuṣṭubh">
.<l n="a">vigatah <app><lem type="emn">maladuhkhinaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">maladaknəḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">maladu<lacunaStart/></rdg></app></l>
.<l n="b">kurvanti <app><lem type="emn">kuśalam</lem><rdg wit="#A">kusalaḥ</rdg></app> mahat,</l>
350<l n="c">gavayakən sutəm citəm,</l>
.<l n="d"><app><lem wit="#A">budi hiyəm maguh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>maṁguḥ</rdg></app> narakəm.</l>
.</lg>
.
.
355<p xml:id="smg_06.03">ka, <app><lem type="emn">venaṅa</lem><rdg wit="#A">naṁṅa</rdg></app> takari kita sami bataṅ marakarma, yan dataṅ ri kita,
. <app><lem wit="#A">marakarma</lem><rdg wit="#B">marag·<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">supta</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sukta</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhaya</term>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">tandri</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">tin·dri</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kleda</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">kaledra</rdg></app>,
360 <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">lajjā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">rāga strī</term>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">paradāra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">paladaraḥ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhak<pb edRef="#A" n="12v"/>ṣabhojana</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">baksyabvaj·ñana</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>baksyi boñana</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kuṭilaviveka</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">kutila, vivedeka</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kutrilaḥviveka</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_06.04">ka, <app><lem wit="#B"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">supta</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sukta</rdg></app> ṅaranya, bəki hees,
365 <app><lem type="emn">kalipikən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalipikin·</rdg></app> mitañakən
. <app><lem wit="#A">pirampesən</lem><rdg wit="#B">na rape<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, dəṅən na
. <app><lem wit="#A">piutamaənana</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nana</rdg></app> soraṅan, kalipian miguna na ṅənah tinəṅ, dəṅ micarek na rampes di nu reya, <app><lem type="omitted_elsewhere">ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">siniguḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">supta</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sukta</rdg></app> ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhaya</term>
370 <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, boraṅ mitañakən maneh, boraṅ naña ja ṅarasa maneh kolot, boraṅ micarek na
. <app><lem wit="#A">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>pes·</rdg></app>, ya ta <term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhaya</term> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">tandri</term> ṅaranya, mumulan naña ja ṅarasa maneh irəg,
. <app><lem wit="#A">mumul</lem><rdg wit="#B"><unclear>ma</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> miguna na ṅənah hədap dəṅən micarek na rampes ka nu reya, ya <term xml:lang="san-Latn">tandri</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kleda</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">kaleda</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ladra</rdg></app> ṅaranya, takut miguna na ṅənah
. <app><lem wit="#B">tinəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ti<unclear>h</unclear>nəṁ</rdg></app> ka nu reya, takut mitañakən
375 <app><lem wit="#A">maneh</lem><rdg wit="#B">mane<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ya
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kleda</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">tan·dri</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">lajjā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">laña</rdg></app> ṅaranya, supən naña ja ṅarasa maneh irəg, supən bakti ja ṅarasa
. <app><lem wit="#A">maneh kolot</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>kolvat·</rdg></app>, supən bakti ja ṅarasa maneh bəṅhar<pb edRef="#A" n="8r"/>,
. <app><lem type="emn">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">ta</rdg></app>
380 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">lajjā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">laña</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lajña</rdg></app> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">rāga stri</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh dek</lem><rdg wit="#B">bvagoḥ de<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">suklasvanita</lem><rdg wit="#A">sukasvanita</rdg></app> dəṅ hayaṅ dek bəṅhar, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">rāga strī</term> ṅaranya, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">paradāra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">paladaraḥ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hayaṅ di rara hulanjar,
. <app><lem wit="#A">astri laraṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>laraṅan</rdg></app> sakalih, ya
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">paradāra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">paladaraḥ</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
385 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhakṣabhojana</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">bak·syibvañana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">bakasyi bvañan:a</rdg></app> ṅaranya, tan hana magavay hayu, ya
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhakṣabhojana</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">bvañana</rdg></app>, ṅa, bogoh ñatu, bogoh ṅinum, <sic>dəṅ hjə</sic> kena
. <app><lem type="emn">kabəkina</lem><rdg wit="#A">kabikina</rdg><rdg wit="#B">bo<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> dituvukan na sad-rasa, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">bhakṣabhojana</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">bak·syibvañana</rdg></app> ṅaranya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kuṭilaviveka</term> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">dimaṅke-maṅke</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>maṁke-maṁke</rdg></app> dek miguna na
390 <app><lem wit="#B">ṅənah</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅinaḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">hədap</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">tinəṁ</rdg></app> dəṅən micarek na
. <app><lem wit="#A">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">karam·pesa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ka nu reya, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-mala ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
395 <note corresp="txt:SiGu_10.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_10.02">SiGu 10.2</ref>: <foreign>ka, supta, ṅa, bvat turu, katuron tumakonakna kaṅ hayu, mvaṅ viśeṣaniṅ janmanya, katuron ta maṅgavayakna enak ambək, mvaṅ mujarakna hayu ri paḍanya janma, bhaya ṅaranya, vədi-vədi tumakonakən hitāvasānaniṅ janma, vədi sevaka ri tuhanya, vədi ri ujar rahayu, tandrī, ṅa, luhya tumakonakna puṅguṅnya, luhya gumavay enak ambək, mvaṅ mujarakna hayu, ya tandrī, ṅa, kleda, ṅa, jrih gumavayakna enak ambək, jrih tumakonakna hitāvasānaniṅ janma, lajjā ṅa, eraṅ-eraṅ tumakonakna kapuṅguṅnya, eraṅ sevaka ri tuhanya, eraṅ sevaka deniṅ sukhanya, rāgastrī, ṅa, viṣaya harəp maṅrabi, mvaṅ harəp sukha, paradāra, ṅa, ṅalap estri laraṅan, bhakṣabhojana, ṅa, dr̥pta maṅanuṅgalakən kinabelan, kuṭila viveka, ṅa, hələm gumavayakna inak ambək mvaṅ mujarakna hayu ri paḍanya janma, məta, ṅa, avərə deniṅ sukhanya, avərə deniṅ prajñānya, avərə deniṅ paṅavruhnya, averə deniṅ guṇanya, ya məta, ṅa, babadan hilaṅakna ikaṅ ambək yan maṅkana denta</foreign>. Cf. also Ślo 84.2.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="7" xml:id="smg_07">
400<head type="editorial">Ten Hells (<foreign>dasa-naraka</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_07.01">nihan ta muvah sinaṅguh
. <app><lem type="emn">dasa-naraka</lem><rdg wit="#A">dasanaka</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>sa-naraka</rdg></app>, ṅa, ini byaktana, cəli, mata, iruṅ, letah, suṅut, kulit, ləṅən,
. <app><lem wit="#A">payu</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, purusa, suku.</p>
405<p xml:id="smg_07.02">ka, cəli ṅaranna, mulah salah deṅe, tereh vaṅvaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">kapirəṅə</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅə, teka Ata k:apisiṅgiḥ</rdg></app>, byaktanya ha<pb edRef="#A" n="8v"/>var, coṅe, torek, cadaṅ, sakitu
. <app><lem wit="#A">pipapaənana</lem><rdg wit="#B">pipa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, di na taliṅa.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.03">mata ṅaranna, mulah <app><lem type="emn">sajəəṅ-jəəṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">sajəqəṁ jəqəṁṅəna</rdg></app>, lamun ka hulañjar
. <app><lem wit="#A">sakalih, astri</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>Istri</rdg></app> laraṅan sakalih, lamun
410 <app><lem wit="#B">lain</lem><rdg wit="#A">laI</rdg></app> boga uraṅ, byaktana ma, pecak<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> bolor<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A">putikən</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ceaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ce<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, buta loroṅən, mata kotokən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> bilas susuhən, sakitu pipapaənana, di mata.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.04">iruṅ ma ṅaranna, gəra bogoh
. <app><lem type="norm">saambə-ambəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">saAbə-Abəna</rdg></app>, lamun ṅambə biuk hapək,
415 <app><lem type="conj">ku hañir</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">ku biUk· ku hañir</rdg></app>, ku haṅit, teka dipake bumarəsin<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ṅahubus, byaktana ma, mekmek<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sakitu pipapaənana di na iruṅ.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.05"><app><lem wit="#A">letah ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ta ma</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅarasa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṅa</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">gəra bogoh sarasa-rasana</lem><rdg wit="#B">mulaḥ bvago saṁrasaran·</rdg></app>, lamun ku
. <app><lem wit="#B">bari</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="transposition">bira</rdg></app> ku tiis, ku bacin, <app><lem type="omitted_elsewhere">ku
420 <app><lem type="emn">hasəm</lem><rdg wit="#A">hasim</rdg></app>, ku lada, ku paṅset</lem><witDetail wit="#A" type="retained"/><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, teka dipake usuh-asahan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">byaktana</lem><rdg wit="#B">bya<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ma, pirə, petal<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> cadel, sakitu<pb edRef="#A" n="9r"/> pipapaənana, di letah ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.06"><app><lem type="emn">suṅut</lem><rdg wit="#A">suṁṅat</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna,
. <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>mulaḥ</rdg></app> dipake kumapaṅ-kapaṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A">heṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">hegan·</rdg></app> dipake sacarek-carekna, maṅkaṅuni dipake
425 <app><lem wit="#A">ñumpah</lem><rdg wit="#B">ñumpa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> madahkən, ṅajak ṅapus ka sakalih, byaktana ma,
. <app><lem type="norm">sombeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">so</add>beṁ(<del>b·</del>)·</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> beṅo, dəda, sakitu
. <app><lem wit="#A">pipapaənana</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>paqənan:a</rdg></app>, di
. <app><lem type="emn">suṅut</lem><rdg wit="#A">suṅt·</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.07"><app><lem wit="#A">kulit ma ṅaranna, bogoh</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">kulit mulaḥ bogvaḥ</rdg></app> saprasa-prasana, lamun ku panas ku tiis, ku meraṅ ku
430 <app><lem wit="#A">atəl</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">gatəla<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, dipake gulaṅgasehan, byaktana ma, tibar, bisul, boloṅən, radaṅ, kuris<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> beaṅ,
. <app><lem type="emn">saukur</lem><rdg wit="#A">saUkar</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>Aḥ</rdg></app> balas galigata, sakitu pipapaənana, di kulit.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.08">ləṅən ma ṅaranna<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh</lem><rdg wit="#B">mula<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> dipake sacokot-cokotna, maṅuni boga sakalih, ka tatanəman sakalih,
. <app><lem wit="#A">sañarah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ñaraḥ</rdg></app> dipake mərəp<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> nəvək, notok<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> mokol, nampar, ṅajambak, ñivit<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
435 <app><lem wit="#A">ṅa<pb edRef="#A" n="9v"/>gətil</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">nvajok·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">byaktana</lem><rdg wit="#B">byita<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ma, keked<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem type="norm">rempeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">repeṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">buntuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">butuṁ</rdg></app>, kəṅkəṅ, sakitu pipapaənana, di na ləṅən.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.09">tumbuṅ ṅaranna,
440 <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>laḥ dipake</rdg></app> sahətut-hətutna, ṅisiṅ sagəsan-gəsanna, di
. <app><lem type="norm">piṅgir</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pigir</rdg></app> imah sakalih,
. <app><lem wit="#A">sañarah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> dipake muak, byaktana kabəratan, tuju pañcar, kaliṅsir, uirən, sakitu pipapaənana, di tumbuṅ.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.10">purusa ma ṅaranna, bogoh
. <app><lem type="emn">sakiih-kiihna</lem><rdg wit="#A"><add place="below">sa</add>kiIḥ kiIna</rdg></app>, sañarah tu dipake ṅambah lanaṅ vadon,
445 <app><lem type="norm">papañjiṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">papajiṁṅan</rdg></app>, kapiadi<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> kapilañcək, kapisuan, kaponakan, byaktana ma, burut, petot, lañjo,
. <app><lem type="emn">halaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hacaṁ</rdg></app> visaya, pəluh, sakitu pipapaənana, di
. <app><lem type="emn">purusa</lem><rdg wit="#A">rusa</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_07.11">suku ta ma ṅaranna, bogoh dipake
. <app><lem type="norm">satiñcak-tiñcakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">saticak·-ticak·na</rdg></app>, saləmpaṅ-ləmpaṅna, maṅkaṅuni lamun ṅaler ṅidul ṅulon ṅetan, lamun titarum tipagut, tuluy<pb edRef="#A" n="10r"/> dipake nejeh, byaktana ma, lisuh<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> patəh, añjiṅən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> caniran, sakitu pipapaənana, di suku ṅaranya.</p>
450<p xml:id="smg_07.12">nihan <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">siṁguḥ</rdg></app> dasa-naraka ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka darma, hayua pinintuhu ika.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="8" xml:id="smg_08">
.<head type="editorial">Five Objects of attention (<foreign>pañca-iyatna</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_08.01">nihan sinaṅguh pañca-iyatna ṅaranya, ndah ya nihan silokanya.</p>
455
. <lg xml:id="smg_08.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="anuṣṭubh">
. <l n="a"><app><lem type="norm">akrodho</lem><rdg wit="#A">Akva2dva</rdg></app>, <app><lem type="conj">guruśuśruṣā</lem><rdg wit="#A">gurusuci</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="b">śaucam <app><lem type="emn">āhāralāghavam</lem><rdg wit="#A">Amaralagavamə·</rdg></app>,</l>
.<l n="c"><app><lem type="conj">apramādaś ca pañca vaite</lem><rdg wit="#A">hana pramadasvate</rdg></app>,</l>
460 <l n="d"><app><lem type="emn">niyamāḥ parikīrtitāḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">nayimaḥ paririkita</rdg></app>, </l>
.</lg>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_08.03">ka, <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">akrodho</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Akva2dva</rdg></app> ṅaranya, tan dadi ikaṅ saṅ sevaka darma, mitonakən
. <app><lem type="emn">krodanya riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kva2danyaniṁ</rdg></app> harəpən saṅ matuha, maṅkaṅuni di nu reya,
465 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">āhāralāghavam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Aralagavəg·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, teka sumari sumarəmbah, hantə ṅənah basa ñatu basa ṅinum, di harəpən saṅ pandita,
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">apramādaś ca pañca vaite</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Ahanaprəmadasvate</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅaran·</rdg></app>, aya ta nu dipikən ku sakalih, kəsit tuṅi diturutan, pituahənana, hantə dek
. <app><lem type="emn">mənaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">mənaṁ minaṁ</rdg></app><pb edRef="#A" n="10v"/> mitinəṅkən maneh, dəṅ hantə dek ñyar na pirampesənana, nihan sinaṅguh pañca-iyatna ṅaranya, 5.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
470 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_03.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_03.02">SiGu 3.2</ref>: <foreign>akrodho, ṅa, tar dadi ika saṅ sevaka dharma, mentonakəna krvadhanya i harəpən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh i para sujanma kabaih, guruśuśruṣā ṅaranya, bakty anukul ta kita ri saṅ guru, tar madvah ri suku saṅ matuha, tuhu maṅkana yar hana pakvan saṅ guru, pariśuddha ta kunaṅ, kayatnakna ta ṅ trikāya paramārtha, ya ulah rahayu, śabda rahayu, ambək rahayu, advah parək kayatnakna ikaṅ trikāya maṇḍala pariśuddha mvaṅ daśaśīla, pañcaśikṣā, nihan kaśuśrūṣāniṅ maṅguru ṅaranya, śauca masəhan taṅan, yan gamələn taḍahən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh drabya hyaṅ saṅ paṇḍita, āhāralāghava, śīghra ta kitānaḍah, agəṅ kəpəl kāmakara śīghrānaḍah, hayva ta kita maṅkana, ya kukṣi pura ṅaranya, umapa pva deniṅ manaḍah kaliṅanya, ya ta prāṇa sadhāraṇa juga upajīvaniṅ umaṅən-aṅən saṅ hyaṅ hayu, nihan pañcaśikṣā, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
475<div type="chapter" n="9" xml:id="smg_09">
.<head type="editorial">Four Means (<foreign>catur-upaya</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_09.01">nihan sinaṅguh catur-upaya ṅaranya, artanya nihan.</p>
.<lg xml:id="smg_09.02" xml:lang="san-Latn">
480<l n="a"><app><lem type="norm">ālekhyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">Alekiqəm·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">hasitam</lem><rdg wit="#A">sitəm·</rdg></app> <app><lem type="emn">gītam</lem><rdg wit="#A">gətəm</rdg></app>,</l>
.<l n="b"> <app><lem type="emn">jr̥mbhanam</lem><rdg wit="#A">jrəbanəm·</rdg></app> kadaranəm,</l>
. <l n="c"><app><lem type="emn">śuddham ca phalarahasyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">sudəm· palaharasiqəm·</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="d"><app><lem type="emn">na karotu gurumukhe</lem><rdg wit="#A">naka2teḥgurumvateh</rdg></app>.</l>
485</lg>
.
. <p xml:id="smg_09.03">ka, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">ālekhyam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">Atekyəm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ ñoker tanəh,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nulis-nulis</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nulis</rdg></app> paduṅ, paṅluṅguhan
. <app><lem wit="#A">sare</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> di harəpən saṅ guru, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">hasitam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sidəm</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sitəm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah suməri sumarəmbah
490 <app><lem wit="#A">di harəpən</lem><rdg wit="#B">da<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> saṅ guru sañarah ñiyar
. <app><lem type="emn">pikaulinanən</lem><rdg wit="#A">pikaUlinan·nanən·</rdg></app> di saṅ pandita, di nu reya,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">gītam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">gətəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>təm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅiduṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ṅavih</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅənaḥ ṅavi ṅiduṁ</rdg></app>, humaləaṅ, maṅkaṅuni mikonokən maneh
. <app><lem wit="#A">bisa, prəña</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> vijaksana,
495 <app><lem wit="#A">di nu reya</lem><rdg wit="#B">di<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">jr̥mbhanam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">jrabanəm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn">hantə</lem><rdg wit="#A">hanta</rdg></app> ṅənah mikonokən maneh
. <app><lem wit="#A">hanaaṅ poño</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ha pvaño</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">aṅgəs ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> vərə səbəh, di harəpən saṅ pandita, maṅ<pb edRef="#A" n="11r"/>kaṅuni di nu reya, kadaranəm ṅaranya,
500 <app><lem wit="#A">hantə</lem><rdg wit="#B">ha<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">ṅənah</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅinaḥ</rdg></app> uraṅ ṅogan
. <app><lem type="emn">humandəru</lem><rdg wit="#A">humardəru</rdg></app>, maṅkaṅuni kumuliat, di harəpən nu reya,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śuddham</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sudəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>əm</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah hura-hura, bobohoṅan, na
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅ lemek</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəI lemek·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gyə Uraṁ lemek·</rdg></app>,
505 <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">phalarahasyam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">palarahasiqəm·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">palarahasəm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah
. <app><lem wit="#A">bogoh</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> mupulihkən
. <app><lem wit="#A">bobogaan</lem><rdg wit="#B">ba<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> sakalih, na
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">karotu gurumukhe</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">naka2teḥ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah rumagodeh, na
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəI</rdg></app>
510 <app><lem wit="#A">lemek</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>k·</rdg></app>, di harəpən saṅ pandita, nihan sinaṅguh catur-upaya ṅaranya, kayatna-yatna saṅ sevaka darma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hayva pinintuhu</lem><rdg wit="#B">yva <unclear>pa</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_04.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_04.02">SiGu 4.2</ref>: <foreign>ālekhyam, ṅa, hayvānurat-nurat ləmah hayvānurat salə, ṅuniveh śarīranta, yan pasevaka ri saṅ guru, apan ya pinakavvaṅ sulakṣaṇa, agələm tumulis-tulis pupunya, yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru, hasitam tan paguyvan-guyvan, ri harəpən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh abañvala, gītam tan paṅiduṅ, denya tan pamikvanvakən kavijakṣaṇaan, yar tan kinvan de saṅ guru, jr̥mbhanam tan paṅucap lapā varəg ri harəpən saṅ guru, kaṇṭhāravam, tan paṅhvab, †akadanəm† tan paṅulet ri harəpən saṅ guru, †sudəm† phalarahasyam tan paṅucap aṅkara ri harəpən saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mikvanvakən namaniṅ mañal hila-hila maṅkana, na karotu gurumukhe ṅaranya, nihan kaliṅanya, tar magavayakna saṅ sevaka dharma</foreign>.</note>
515 </app>
.</listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="10" xml:id="smg_10">
.<head type="editorial">Five Explanations (<foreign>pañca-byakta</foreign>)</head>
520
.<p xml:id="smg_10.01">nihan sinaṅguh pañca-byakta ṅaranya, silokanya nihan.</p>
.<lg xml:id="smg_10.02" xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="1"><app><lem wit="#A">selajanəm</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>selajan:ənəm·</rdg></app> suravile, panatargasudya ceva,</l>
. <l n="2">prayagamanəm cevamasva, cevamibuh karmavidu,</l>
525 <l n="3">cevayude danakaləm, ma suprəgrahaste.</l>
.</lg>
.
.
.<p xml:id="smg_10.03">ka, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem rend="check">selajanəm</lem></app></term> ṅaranya, ñapira ṅahantə-hantə, lamun lemek matiṅtim<pb edRef="#A" n="11v"/> di
530 <app><lem wit="#A">harəpən nu</lem><rdg wit="#B">haṚp:ən<unclear>·</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kolot, suravile ṅaranya, ñapirakən maṅuni lemek
. <app><lem type="norm">matiṅtim</lem><rdg wit="#A">matitim·</rdg></app>, hantə make paṅabakti, ka saṅ pandita, dəṅ hantə ṅənah vədak-vədakan, kaambə ku nu reya, asvagatah kunaṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">panatarga</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah ñusutan huntu,
. <app><lem type="emn">dəṅ masaṅgereṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">di masagereṁ</rdg></app> di harəpən nu reya,
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">sudyacava</term></lem></app> ma ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ niru-niru kaulinan həmpul mirus, <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">praya saṅ magama</term></lem></app> ta ma, hantə ṅənah uraṅ padələ-dələ dəṅ saṅ
535 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> kalih, maṅkaṅuni padu na muka, padələ-dələ bəṅət, ka nu karolot, maṅkaṅuni mupulihkən maneh ñatu ṅinum di harəpən nu reya, <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cevamasvateh</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, teka salah dipihdip dipiaṅən-aṅən, ka pada janma,
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cevamibuh</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, goce rua, goce tuah, hamo nurut pamagaha<pb edRef="#A" n="12r"/>n,
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">karmavidu</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, kəsit tuṅi hasəm baruṅut, ruṅsaṅ-ruṅsiṅ na pibudiən janma, <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cevayude</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, goce rua, goce tuahna, goce pupuna, sinaṅguh kanistaniṅ janma,
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">ceva yude</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, suraṅ pragojak, bogoh ñocoo sabda pariambul ka sakalih,
. <app><lem rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">danakaləm</term></lem></app> ta ma ṅaranna, hantə
540 <app><lem type="emn">dek</lem><rdg wit="#A">de</rdg></app> haat karuña, heman
. <app><lem type="emn">pada</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="transposition">dapa</rdg></app> janma, na aṅən-aṅən gəde kacəcəb,
. <app><lem rend="check">suprigrəhasta</lem></app> ṅaranya, gəde nu dipikahayaṅ, dipilemek aṅən-aṅən, dibaan lemek dimaṅke-maṅke, gəs ma hantə kasoraṅ, nihan <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅgah</lem><rdg wit="#A">sinaṁga</rdg></app> pañca-byakta ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="emn">hayua</lem><rdg wit="#A">hayu</rdg></app> pinintuhu ika, 5.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
545 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_04.03"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_04.03">SiGu 4.3</ref>: <foreign>ka, śalākāñjanam tan pacələkan ri harəpən saṅ guru, ri harəpən istri laraṅan, suravile tan pakrala-krala yar paṅucap ṅuniveh yan pasila, tan lepana, tan pavədakan, yar baturan saṅ guru, ṅuniveh mijil valaharnya panti asvāgata kunaṅ, dantagharsā, tan pasusur yan paṅucap lavan saṅ guru, adhyasta tar pahyasniṅ memen, agəṇḍiṅ kecaka, hārahataḥ tan pavaja savilah, prayāsamāgama, tan padələan lavan istri laraṅan, ṅuniveh istri saṅ guru, mava Ivak sama dagiṅ, tan paṅabhyāsa paṅan inum, ri harəpən saṅ guru, ya ika sinaṅguh dharmaśikṣā, ṅa, kayatnakna saṅ sevaka dharma</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
550<div type="chapter" n="11" xml:id="smg_11">
.<head type="editorial">Four Devotions (<foreign>catur-paṅabakti</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_11.01">nihan sinaṅguh catur-paṅabakti ṅaranya, silokanya nihan.</p>
.
. <lg xml:id="smg_11.02" xml:lang="san-Latn">
555 <l n="a"><app><lem type="emn">gurutalam</lem><rdg wit="#A">gurutaliqəm</rdg></app> <app><lem type="emn">pravakṣyāmi</lem><rdg wit="#A">prəvaksiAmən</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="b"><app><lem type="norm">mahāyānam</lem><rdg wit="#A">mahayanəm</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">hi tiṣṭhati</lem><rdg wit="#A">hyaṁ tistati</rdg></app>,</l>
. <l n="c">durba<pb edRef="#A" n="12v"/>gehina sahbesah,</l>
. <l n="d">griyapa
560 <app><lem type="emn">praṇamyāsīt</lem><rdg wit="#A">prərnamyaset·</rdg></app>.</l>
.</lg>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_11.03">ka, <app><lem type="emn">gurutalam</lem><rdg wit="#A">gurutayəm</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah gəra-gəra lemek
. <app><lem type="norm">matiṅtim</lem><rdg wit="#A">matitim·</rdg></app> di harəpən saṅ pandita,
565 <app><lem type="emn">pravakṣyāmi</lem><rdg wit="#A">prəvaksyima</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah micarek karampesan di harəpən saṅ pandita, sañarah di nu reya, maṅuni
. <app><lem type="norm">induṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Iduṁ</rdg></app> bapa paṅguruan, mahayanəm ṅaranya, teka lipi mitinəṅkən maneh,
. <app><lem type="emn" rend="check">hi tiṣṭhati</lem><rdg wit="#A">hyatrisṭānata</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ tatap laṅguk ka nu karolot,
. <app><lem type="emn" rend="check">durbhagahīne sarveśaṁ</lem><rdg wit="#A">tidurbagehinasahbesah</rdg></app> ṅaranya, teka
. <app><lem type="emn">lipi-lupa</lem><rdg wit="#A">lipi-lupu</rdg></app> di nu harəp<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> hantə kapitinəṅ na pirampesən,
570 <app><lem type="emn" rend="check">griyapa praṇamyāsīt</lem><rdg wit="#A">griApa prərnamiyaset</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ṅamaṅke-maṅke dek
. <app><lem type="norm">bəṅhar</lem><rdg wit="#A">bəhar</rdg></app> vaya-vaya, diboga hulun kuriṅ kavula vnaṅ-vnaṅ, gəs ma hantə kasoraṅ, ya
. <app><lem type="emn">praṇamyāsīt</lem><rdg wit="#A">prənamyiset·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, nihan sinaṅguh catur-paṅabakti ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
575 <note corresp="txt:SiGu_05.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_05.02">SiGu 5.2</ref>: <foreign>ini guru talapakan pravakṣyāmi, umucapan saṅ hyaṅ hayu, mahāyānam hyatisṭanti, atīta ya saṅ mahādhika, svagata maheśvara, hulun hadyan kaniṣṭha madhyamvattama, laki vadvan, ya vataṅakən sādhyanya saṅ hyaṅ hayu, vinarah ya ri guru talapakan rumuhun, apa [A:12v] dumehnya maṅkana, guru tan magave durbhaga, yan apa ikā, ya tinutakən ikaṅ guru talapakan rumuhun, sakābhyāsa praṇamyāsīt, tlas pva kita tumutakəna ikaṅ guru talapakan ri ki[B:20v]ta, praṇamya yātah səmbahən, səmbahən ṅaranya, pituhun</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
.
.</div>
580<div type="chapter" n="12" xml:id="smg_12">
.<head type="editorial">Five Objects of Attention (<foreign>pañca-prayatna</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_12.01">nihan <pb edRef="#A" n="13r"/> sinaṅguh pañca-<app><lem type="emn">prayatna</lem><rdg wit="#A">prəyana</rdg></app> ṅaranya, silokanya nihan.</p>
. <lg xml:id="smg_12.02" xml:lang="san-Latn">
. <l n="a"><app><lem type="emn">hīnavākyam</lem><rdg wit="#A">hinavakyima</rdg></app> <app><lem type="norm">siṅharupañ</lem><rdg wit="#A">siharupañ</rdg></app> ca <app><lem type="norm">grahaste</lem><rdg wit="#A"/></app>,</l>
585 <l n="b"><app><lem type="norm">gurusaṅghāsanam</lem><rdg wit="#A">gurusaṅgasanəm</rdg></app> prətanəm<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>,</l>
. <l n="c">grəhaste nāmani mate.</l>
. </lg>
.
. <p xml:id="smg_12.03">ka,
590 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">hīnavākyam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">hinavakyi</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ micarek na rampes, ṅavuruk di harəpən nu kolot,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">siṅharupañ ca grəhaste</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">siṁharupa ca grəhaste</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ kajəəṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">punduṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">puduṁ</rdg></app> tə suka, ku nu kolot, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">gurusaṅghāsanam</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">gurusaṁgasanəm·, prətanəm·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ gərah bijah suka grəjita, lamun kasampak di jalan<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> basa uraṅ ṅalasan ṅala kayu ṅala daun, diña uraṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">ṅaduṅkak</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅadukak·</rdg></app> teka kasampak ku saṅ pandita, maṅkaṅuni pahəla-həla ləmpaṅ, teka rəjəṅ maṅka dinapak maya saṅ matuha, tə ṅənah uraṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A" rend="check"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">prətanəm</term></lem></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah ṅambəan tadahən saṅ guru, maṅkaṅuni make papakaraṅan saṅ pandita, ṅala savenan ṅala tunda,
595 <app><lem wit="#A" rend="check">grəha<pb edRef="#A" n="13v"/>ste namaniṅ mate</lem></app> ṅaranya, hantə ṅənah uraṅ ñəbut ṅaran
. <app><lem type="norm">ambu</lem><rdg wit="#A">Abu</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ayah, ṅuni paṅguruan, maṅkaṅuni na matuha, sañarah ṅaran saṅ prəbu, rama, rəsi, disi, tarahan, nihan sinaṅguh pañca-<app><lem type="emn">prayatna</lem><rdg wit="#A">Iyatna</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="conj">liṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> saṅ pandita, 5.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
600 <note corresp="txt:SiGu_05.03"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_05.03">SiGu 5.3</ref>: <foreign>anāma tan kapaṅguh namaniṅ guru, hīnavākyam tan paṅucap saṅ hyaṅ hayu, tan upəta saṅ matuha, siṁharupañ ca grahaste, katvantān pintonakən krodha ri saṅ guru, tan dadi maṅkana, saṅ guru saṁghāsanam pr̥tatəm śumīghraa yan kapapag saṅ guru ri havan, ane kapaṅguh ri svadeśa kunaṅ, səmbahən ta saṅ guru, mvaṅ tan agəlis mavuvus ri saṅ guru, ṅuniveh tan paruhunan laku [B:21v] saṅ guru, tan pavurugan yan padyus, tan panapak maya saṅ guru, tan paṅhəban saṅ guru, tan paṅinum tvak saṅ guru, tan paṅambvan taḍahən saṅ guru, tan paṅaṅgva agəm-agəman saṅ guru, yan tan kinvan, len saṅka rika, tan pabaryan-baryan astri saṅ guru, anak saṅ guru, rāma tuha saṅ guru, pesi saṅ guru, kapvanakan [A:13v] saṅ guru, tagon-tagonan saṅ guru, tadinan saṅ guru, nahan sinaṅguh guru talapakan ṅaranya, kayatnakəna saṅ sevaka dharma</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="13" xml:id="smg_13">
605<head type="editorial">Three Elements (<foreign>tri-buta</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_13.01">nihan sinaṅguh tri-buta ṅaranya, byaktanya nihan, hala tumimu halanya, vilut tumimu vilutnya, duka tumimu dukanya.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_13.02">ka, hala ṅaranya
. <app><lem type="conj">goce</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="haplography"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, goce pisampakənana, ja goce nu dipiguna, vilut
610 <app><lem type="conj">ṅaranya belot, belot</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="haplography">ṅaranya, belot</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>belvat·</rdg></app> pisampakənana, ja belot nu dipiguna, duka ṅaraniṅ risi, risi
. <app><lem wit="#A">pisampakənana</lem><rdg wit="#B">pisam·pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ja risi nu dipiguna, nihan sinaṅguh tri-buta ṅaranya, kayatnakən saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">sevaka darma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>darma</rdg></app>, hayva pinintuhu ika.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="14" xml:id="smg_14">
615<head type="editorial">Four Facifiers (<foreign>catur-pasanta</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_14.01">nihan sinaṅguh <app><lem type="emn">catur-pasanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">catar-pasanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">catur-sapata</rdg></app> ṅaranya, byaktanya
. <app><lem wit="#A">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B">nihan<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, cakra jalakuna, cakra jalapaksa, cakra
. <app><lem type="emn">sambarana</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabirana</rdg></app>, cakra taraṅgabahu<pb edRef="#A" n="14r"/>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
620 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_07.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_07.01">SiGu 7.1</ref>: <foreign>hana kapiṅpitunya sih saṅ paṇḍita, ri saṅ sevaka dharma, saṅ hyaṅ caduśakti saṅ paṇḍita, ṅa, apa kari mataṅ yan caduśakti, ṅa, pat śakti, ṅa, bisanya, ya ta pinakasañjata saṅ paṇḍita, ndya ya nihan, cakra jalakuna, cakra jalapakṣa, cakra sambharaṇa, cakra taraṅgabāhu</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_14.02">cakra jalakuna ma ṅaranya matapoe, pamahalana
625 <app><lem type="emn">ka</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaṁ</rdg></app> sarira, lamur<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> pecak, bilas<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sakit mata, buta loroṅən, mata kotokən, hulap, cakra jalapaksa ma cai, mahalana ka sarira, gumigil panas tiris, cakra
. <app><lem type="emn">sambarana</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabirana</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>biramaḥ</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna
. <app><lem type="emn">aṅin</lem><rdg wit="#A">Aṅən·</rdg></app>, mahalana ma
. <app><lem wit="#B">ka</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaṁ</rdg></app> sarira, beaṅ, galigata, pipisisan, siṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">savatək</lem><rdg wit="#B">saṁvatək<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kasakit di kulit, cakra taraṅgabahu ma gunuṅ ṅaranna, mahalana ka sarira ma,
630 <app><lem wit="#A">riət hulu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>t· hulu</rdg></app>, ñəri bətəṅ, mədu, kavayaan, sakoeh sakit di jəro bətəṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B">nihan· <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">sinaṁguḥ</rdg></app> catur-pasanta ṅaranya, kayatnakən saṅ sevaka darma, hayva ri rahaseya.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="15" xml:id="smg_15">
635<head type="editorial">Five Misfortunes (<foreign>pañca-kapataka</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.01"><app><lem wit="#A">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nihan·</rdg></app> sinaṅguh pañca-kapataka ṅaranya, byaktanya nihan<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> duka saṅka riṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">buta, duka</lem><rdg wit="#B">buta <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> saṅka riṅ devata,
. <app><lem type="conj">duka ku na tri-bva<pb edRef="#A" n="14v"/>na</lem><rdg wit="#A">duka saṁka riṁ tribvana lvaka, duka kunaṁ tribvana</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.02"><app><lem wit="#A">duka</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>duka</rdg></app> saṅka riṅ buta ma ṅaranya, paeh <app><lem type="norm">disantok</lem><rdg wit="#A">disantva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">disan·tvak·</rdg></app>
640 <app><lem wit="#A">oray</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">Ula</rdg></app>, dipanah gəlap, disaṅgut buhaya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">katiṅgaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kati<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> paṅpuṅ,
. <app><lem type="emn">dirontok</lem><rdg wit="#A">di2n·tva</rdg></app> mauṅ, paeh diprəraṅ, dihadaṅ, dipuuk, paeh ragrag, sakoehniṅ bajra di pəraṅan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ya duka</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>duka</rdg></app> saṅka riṅ buta ṅaranya.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
645 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.02">SiGu 13.2</ref>: <foreign>kaliṅanya, yan kita kəna ku na upadrava, ku na pañcamahabuta, pati disantok oray, dipanah gəlap, disaṅgut buhaya, katiṅgaṅ paṅpuṅ, dirontok mauṅ, pati dipraṅ, dihadaṅ, dipuuk, pati labuh ti na luhur kai, ditumpu, pati dikəndat, sakvehniṅ bajra, pati di papraṅan, ya duka saṅka ri buta ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.03">duka <app><lem type="norm">saṅka</lem><rdg wit="#A">saka</rdg></app> riṅ devata ma ṅaranya, tajam
650 <app><lem wit="#A">bətəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">səkən·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sakit</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakət</rdg></app> nirisan,
. <app><lem type="emn">riət</lem><rdg wit="#A">riAt·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">si<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> hulu, sakit mata, jaroṅən<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sumbilaṅən, buyan, mədu, panas tiris, ya duka saṅka riṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">devata</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>vata</rdg></app> ṅaranya.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
655 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.02">SiGu 13.2</ref>: <foreign>ya duka saṅka ri devata ma ṅaranya, tajam səkət, nirisan, riət hulu, sakit mata, jaroṅən, sumbilaṅən, buyan, mədu, panas tiris, lara hati, ya duka saṅka ri devata ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.04">duka saṅka riṅ sarira ma, pecak<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> beṅo<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sombeṅ, buta<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
660 <app><lem wit="#A">tuli</lem><rdg wit="#B">tali</rdg></app>, beaṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rumpuṅ<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> tugəl,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ya duka</lem><rdg wit="#B">ya<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> saṅka riṅ sarira ṅaranya, duka kunaṅ tri-bvana ma, nu savatək kapataka di bvana.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.02">SiGu 13.2</ref>: <foreign>ya duka sarira ṅaranya, pecak, beṅo, sombeṅ, buntuṅ, buta tuli, beaṅ, rumpuṅ, tugəl, ya duka sarira ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
665 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.05">ini
. <app><lem wit="#A">byaktana</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>tanaḥ</rdg></app> ma, nu kəna ku na kapapaan,
. <app><lem wit="#B">aya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> di saṅ prəbu<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rama<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rəsi, disi<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> mvaṅ tarahan,
670 <app><lem wit="#A">jadi</lem><rdg wit="#B">ja<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kala kaliyuga, ika vvit papa kale<pb edRef="#A" n="15r"/>sa, jadina saṅ hyaṅ kala, asu si jamproṅ si
. <app><lem wit="#A">karavəlaṅ, jadi</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>jadi</rdg></app> kavah papasaṅan, vəlah taji sula vəsi, di lambur
. <app><lem wit="#B">si patuduhan</lem><rdg wit="#A">patuduḥhun·</rdg></app>, cukaṅ cuət, kalapa
. <app><lem wit="#A">bajra, latak</lem><rdg wit="#B">bajra<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> si balagada ma, cataṅ si tumaṅgəhan, batu kacakup, rayaṅ-rayaṅ si prəca kala si prəca
. <app><lem wit="#A">kali</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>gali</rdg></app>, si beda bañcana, si rekaguna, saṅ
675 <app><lem wit="#A">vəsiguna</lem><rdg wit="#B">myiguna</rdg></app>, saṅ patakaguna, saṅ siptaguna, saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B">kumaraguna</lem><rdg wit="#A">kumara</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.06">ka, ini byaktanya ma, <app><lem wit="#A">samyaguna</lem><rdg wit="#B">saṁmu<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ma, na
. <app><lem type="norm">panday</lem><rdg wit="#A">paday</rdg></app> gəlaṅ, saṅ siptaguna ma,
. <app><lem type="norm">panday</lem><rdg wit="#A">paday</rdg></app> omas, saṅ vəsiguna
680 <app><lem type="norm">ma, panday</lem><rdg wit="#A">ma paday</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>, panday</rdg></app> bəsi, saṅ patakaguna ma, pamadək, saṅ mulaguna ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">pahuma</lem><rdg wit="#B">paṁhuma</rdg></app>, saṅ siptaguna ma,
. <app><lem type="norm">paṅundahagian</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅudaḥhagyiAn·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṁṅun·dahagyi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj">saṅ rekaguna</lem><rdg wit="#A">guna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">guna<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ma, na həmpul, saṅ kumara ma, memen, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> kala ma, patik
685 <app><lem wit="#A">haji</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ji</rdg></app>, si
. <app><lem wit="#A">jampoṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">jam·proṁ</rdg></app> si
. <app><lem wit="#A">karavilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">taravəṁlaṁ</rdg><!-- similar --></app> ma, barat katiga,
. <app><lem wit="#B">rayaṅ-rayaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ta rayaṁ rayaṁ</rdg></app> ma, nu tan paṅaran, beda bañcana ma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">pa<pb edRef="#A" n="15v"/>dagaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, təgal
690 <app><lem rend="check">malva</lem></app> ma, na ləbuh, salaksi loñana ma, na paṅgərək,
. <app><lem wit="#A">labuhan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>labuhan</rdg></app> bulan ma, na
. <app><lem wit="#A">prəjala</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">juru jala</rdg></app>, voṅ papa ma nu bobotoh, voṅ kalesa ma na dasa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">si</lem><rdg wit="#B">va<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">manarema ma</lem><rdg wit="#A">manareṁ ma</rdg></app>, calagara, si
695 <app><lem type="emn">manarek ma</lem><rdg wit="#A">manareka ma</rdg></app>, na paṅuraṅ, cataṅ si tumagən ma, na parada,
. <app><lem wit="#A">lambur si patuduhan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>si patuduḥhan</rdg></app> ma, na
. <app><lem wit="#A">kasasa</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">kaAsa-Asa</rdg></app>, cukaṅ cuət ma, na paməəṅ,
. <app><lem type="emn">kalapa bajra</lem><rdg wit="#A">kala bajra</rdg></app> ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">na pañadap</lem><rdg wit="#B">na<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, latak si balagada ma, na pañavah, vəlah taji ma, na paṅalas, batu kacakup ma, na
700 <app><lem type="emn">paṅavin</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṁṅaviḥn·</rdg></app>, na kavah ma inya na
. <app><lem wit="#A">paməñəp</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ñəp·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">seeṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">naseya</rdg></app> ma na paṅejo, suluhna ma na panutu,
. <app><lem wit="#B">sənəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">sinana</rdg></app> ma na tuṅgu dapur,
. <app><lem wit="#A">paṅecek</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">paṅocekna</rdg></app> ma na
705 <app><lem wit="#A">harəp catra</lem><rdg wit="#B">haṚ caṭā<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, cai na ma nu purah ṅala
. <app><lem type="norm">pimandiən</lem><rdg wit="#A">pimadiqən·</rdg></app>, ruhak na pañapu, əsəna ma pakotokan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">paceleṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>laṅan</rdg></app>, na paṅitikan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ənu merean</lem><rdg wit="#B">paṁṅerye</rdg></app> ma paṅaṅon,
. <app><lem wit="#B">sarati gajah</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
710 <app><lem wit="#A">nuṅguan</lem><rdg wit="#B">nuṁgya</rdg></app> situ, nuṅguan taman, sakoeh <pb edRef="#A" n="16r"/>
. <app><lem type="norm">nuṅguan</lem><rdg wit="#A">nuguAn·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">nu nu<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> cocooan, kapihulun
. <app><lem type="norm">hiyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hyi</rdg></app>, kapihalaṅ, dipisuku dipitaṅan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">mo vasa di</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>vasa ku</rdg></app> huripnya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">di</lem><rdg wit="#B">də</rdg></app> bənaṅna, ya duka kunaṅ
715 <app><lem wit="#A">tri-bvana</lem><rdg wit="#B">tribvana lvaka</rdg></app>, ṅaranya.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.02">SiGu 13.2</ref>: <foreign>ya duka kunaṅ tribvana ma ṅaranya, hulun, pahuma,[A:22v] pañadap, pañavah, pavataṅan, di[B:38r]pisuku, dipitaṅan, mo visesa di huripnya, di bənaṅnya, di gunanya, ya duka kunaṅ tribvana ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
720</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_15.07">ya ta duka kunaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">tri-bvana-loka</lem><rdg wit="#B">bvanaloka</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">kahuruan</lem><rdg wit="#B">kahurya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">dayəh</lem><rdg wit="#B">da<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, buruṅ tahun, eleh ku sasalad, laru kaṅkaṅ salah masa, sarba pala tan pavvah, sarba satva
725 <app><lem wit="#A">añarak</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>rak·</rdg></app>, ya ta duka kunaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">tri-bvana-loka</lem><rdg wit="#B">bvanalvaka</rdg></app> ṅaranya, <app><lem wit="#A" rend="check">ma, ṅya buku, u, sa, a</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa, ma, ṅa, kayu, ṅa, Usa <add place="below">A</add>la</rdg></app>, nihan sinaṅguh pañca-kapataka
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> liṅ saṅ pandita, 5.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
730 <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.02">13.2</ref>: <foreign>ya duka kunaṅ bvanaloka ma ṅaranya, kahuruan dayəh, buruṅ tahun, eleh dayəh, eleh ku sasalad[C:22r], laru salah masa, sarba satva ñarak, sarba pala tan pavvah, ya duka saṅka ri bvanaloka ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="16" xml:id="smg_16">
735<head type="editorial">Five Animals (<foreign>pañca-triyak</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_16.01">nihan <app><lem type="emn">keṅətakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">k<space type="binding-hole"/>eṅəttaknə</rdg></app> muvah, saṅ sevaka darma, hana
. <app><lem type="emn">pañca-triyak</lem><rdg wit="#A">pañcatraya</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ini</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ni</rdg></app> byaktana,
. <app><lem type="emn">pasu</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">paksa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pak·su</rdg></app>, paksi, sarpa,
740 <app><lem wit="#B">mina</lem><rdg wit="#A">mena</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">pepelikan</lem><rdg wit="#A">pepelika</rdg></app>.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:Vrh_24.02">Vṛh 24.2: <foreign>lima prakāraniṅ tiryak lvirnya, paśu mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpa mīna</foreign>.</note>
745 </app>
.</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_16.02"><app><lem type="emn">pasu</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pak·su</rdg></app> ma ṅaranya, savatək satva
. <app><lem type="emn">di dayəh</lem><rdg wit="#A">di yəh</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">di Ḷm·bur</rdg></app>, paksi ma
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, savatək satva di sisi, sarpa ma ṅaranya, savatək nu napak harəguna, mina ṅaranya, savatə<pb edRef="#A" n="16v"/>k
750 <app><lem wit="#A">satva</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>tva</rdg></app> di cai,
. <app><lem type="emn">pepelikan</lem><rdg wit="#A">lepelika</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">savatək nu</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="transposition">nu savatək</rdg></app> mava caṅkaṅ, nu kumarayap hantə
. <app><lem wit="#B">kañahoan</lem><rdg wit="#A">ñaḥhvaan·</rdg></app>, lavasnya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">sakeṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">sa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> naraka, sevu satus tahun, nihan sinaṅguh pañca-triyak ṅaranya.</p>
755</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="17" xml:id="smg_17">
.<head type="editorial">Four Roots (<foreign>catur-mula</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_17.01">nihan
. <app><lem type="norm">muvah keṅətakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">muvaḥ keṅət·takən·na</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>keṅət:akən·na</rdg></app>, hana ta ya catur-mula ṅaranya, ini
760 <app><lem type="emn">byaktana</lem><rdg wit="#A">ktana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">byitanyi</rdg></app>, mantaja,
. <app><lem wit="#A">urija</lem><rdg wit="#B">vurija</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">payuja</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, bagaja, mantaja ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> savatək bijil ti panon, urija ṅa, nu savatək
. <app><lem type="emn">bijil</lem><rdg wit="#A">bjəl</rdg></app> ti suṅut,
765 <app><lem type="emn">payuja</lem><rdg wit="#A">payuña</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nu savatək</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>savatək</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">bijil</lem><rdg wit="#A">bjal</rdg></app> ti
. <app><lem wit="#B">tumbuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">tubuṁ</rdg></app>, bagaja ṅaranya, nu savatək bijil ti sukla-<app><lem wit="#A">svanita</lem><rdg wit="#B">sunyata</rdg></app>, lavasnya sakeṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">naraka</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">rika</rdg></app>, satus tahun,
770 <app><lem wit="#A">nihan sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">nihan· <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> catur-mula ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SKK_18.5-18.6"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaKandangKaresian.xml#skk_18.05">SKK 18.5–6</ref>: <foreign>ini ma sugan hayaṅ kalihasan ku əsi bvana reyana ta, 4, ini ṅaranna, kurija, mataja, bagaja, payuja. kurija ma ṅaranna, savatək bijil ti suṅut, mataja ma ṅaranna, savatək bijil ti panon, bagaja ma ṅaranna, savatək bijil ti baga, payuja ma ṅaranna, savatək bijil ti tumbuṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh saṅ hyaṅ catur-mula ṅaranna</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
775</listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="18" xml:id="smg_18">
.<head type="editorial">Four Strenghts (<foreign>catur-virya</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_18.01">nihan sinaṅguh catur-virya ṅa, ka, suka ma ṅaranya, ini byaktana, dipake
780 <app><lem wit="#A">gərah</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>grəha</rdg></app>, sugih ma dipake bəṅhar,
. <app><lem wit="#B">suka boga ma</lem><rdg wit="#A">suka ma gəraḥ, ṅa,</rdg></app> dipake
. <app><lem wit="#B">dataṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadataṅan</rdg></app><!-- CRUX -->, virya ma ṅaranya <pb edRef="#A" n="17r"/>dipake mere
. <app><lem wit="#A">maveh, ka</lem><rdg wit="#B">maveh <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> nu jauh, ka nu dəkət, ka kula-kadaṅ baraya, ya ta sinaṅguh catur-virya, ṅa,
. <app><lem type="norm">kayatnakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">kayatnakən:a</rdg></app> ika,
785 <app><lem wit="#A">hayva pinintuhu saṅ sevaka darma</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="transposition"><lacunaEnd/>ka darma, yya pinin·tuhu Ika</rdg></app>.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="19" xml:id="smg_19">
.<head type="editorial">Four Ordinances (<foreign>catur-kalpa</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_19.01">nihan ta
790 <app><lem type="emn">kalpaənana</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaL̥pasənana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kaL̥pas:ən·</rdg></app>, ṅa, hana ta saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">nirmala</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">catur-kalpa</lem><rdg wit="#B">catur<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ṅaranya, ini byaktana, upamana janma tani, purna, svadanta,
. <app><lem type="conj">lastare</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_19.02">tani ma ṅaranya,
795 <app><lem wit="#A">paka dibuat</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ka dibyat·</rdg></app> ñadap masaṅ ñavara,
. <app><lem wit="#A">cocooan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, pəpəlakan, ya tani ṅaranya, purna ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hantə diboga</lem><rdg wit="#B">hantə<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kahivaṅan, kativasan, hantə ditvah cara purih, ya purna ṅaranna, <app><lem type="norm">sudanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">sudata</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, hantə katəbus, kapihalaṅ təguh utaṅ, ya
. <app><lem wit="#A">sudanta, ṅa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nta</rdg></app>, lastare ma ṅaranna, janma banua,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hantə</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">tə</rdg></app> diboga kasakit, hantə diboga kabeṅkeṅ,
800 <app><lem wit="#A">ya lastare</lem><rdg wit="#B">ya ta<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ṅaranya, nihan sinaṅguh catur-kalpa ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita, saki<pb edRef="#A" n="17v"/>tu na
. <app><lem type="norm">keñcakənən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kecakənən·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">saṅ sevaka</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>sevaka</rdg></app> darma.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="20" xml:id="smg_20">
805<head type="editorial">Pure Circle of Three Bodily Domains</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_20.01">ini
. <app><lem wit="#A">ma iña</lem><rdg wit="#B">ma<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> na
. <app><lem type="emn">katuhukənən</lem><rdg wit="#A">katuhu<gap reason="lost" quantity="1" unit="character"/>ənən·</rdg></app> nu dipajar trikaya, nu dipajarkən puhuniṅ hayu, taṅkalniṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">endah</lem><rdg wit="#A">Edah</rdg></app> ta, hana ta saṅ hyaṅ
810 <app><lem type="emn">tri-kaya mandala</lem><rdg wit="#A">trəkaya madala</rdg></app> parisuda ṅaranya, liṅ maha-<app><lem type="emn">pandita</lem><rdg wit="#A">pantadita</rdg></app>, tri ṅaranya təlu, kaya ṅaranya pamagəh,
. <app><lem wit="#A">mandala</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>la ma</rdg></app> ṅaranya sarira, suda ma ṅaranna
. <app><lem type="norm">aṅgəs</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Agəs·</rdg></app> kañahoan.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_20.02">tuhu tri-kaya liṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sa</rdg></app> pandita,
815 <app><lem wit="#A">tri-kayaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">trika<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> loka lavan para,
. <app><lem type="emn">ndya</lem><rdg wit="#A">nədyə</rdg></app> ya sinaṅguh tri-kaya liṅ saṅ pandita, nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#A"><del>sa</del> lvar<del>ka</del>nyi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>kadyaniṁ</rdg></app> manik anarga, lavan manik
