. <app><lem type="emn">sarvesta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">savesṭā</rdg></app>, lavan mas kanaka jatirupa.</p>
820<p xml:id="smg_20.03">nihan saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">tri-rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B">tri<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ṅaranya, nihan lvirnya, hana ñana pasanta, sabda
. <app><lem wit="#A">pasanta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>santa</rdg></app>, budi pasanta,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">ya</rdg></app> sinaṅguh ulah rahayu,
. <app><lem wit="#B">sabda rahayu, ambək rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
825<p xml:id="smg_20.04"><app><lem wit="#A">ini byaktana ulah rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B">byitanyi, na Ula rahayu, ṅa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, umun bakti,
. <app><lem wit="#A">atoṅ atəaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>Atva təAṁ</rdg></app>, takut jarot, kocop
. <app><lem wit="#B">diteoh</lem><rdg wit="#A">beteOḥ</rdg></app>, e<pb edRef="#A" n="18r"/>met
. <app><lem type="emn">imət</lem><rdg wit="#A">Imit</rdg></app> rajən ləkən, paka prədana, ya ulah
. <app><lem wit="#A">rahayu, ṅa</lem><rdg wit="#B">rayu<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</p>
830 <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.04"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.04">SiGu 13.4</ref>: <foreign>ulah paśānta ṅaranya, ulah menak, ulah rahayu, hayva palar cidra, hayva praṅ, ulah rahayu, taṅan masaṅguli, matalaṅkup, yan paṅucap lavan vvaṅ atuha, ya ulah paśānta ṅaranya.</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
835<p xml:id="smg_20.05">sabda rahayu ma, sarseh saneh, haat heman, pesok karuña, ṅaləgət<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ñəcəp, mupruk<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅulas<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ṅala</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅala</rdg></app> aṅən, sakveh sabda krəta, ya ta sinaṅguh sabda rahayu, ṅa.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.04"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.04">SiGu 13.4</ref>: <foreign>śabda paśānta ṅaranya, śabda menak, śabda rahayu, śabda manohara, śabda madavā, śabda manis arum, ya śabda paśānta ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
840 </app>
.</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_20.06">ambək rahayu ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">liñih</lem><rdg wit="#B">li<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">pipir</lem><rdg wit="#A">pirpir</rdg></app>
845 <app><lem type="norm">caaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">caA</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">nahtar</lem><rdg wit="#A">nahtarḥ</rdg></app>, ləga buruan,
. <app><lem type="norm">pañjaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pajaṁ</rdg></app> tajur,
. <app><lem type="emn">gəs</lem><rdg wit="#A">gas</rdg></app> ma dipiguna na baksadi, danadi,
. <app><lem wit="#A">vastradi</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>di</rdg></app>, kaneyadi, ya catur-punya, ṅa, ti iña ma humənəṅ
850 <app><lem wit="#A">budi</lem><rdg wit="#B">saṁ pandita</rdg></app>, heraṅ tinəṅ, cipta
. <app><lem wit="#B">loganda</lem><rdg wit="#A">l<unclear>o</unclear>gada</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">budi rahayu</lem><rdg wit="#B">budi<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, diga manik inisuhan, kadi bañu di ron sulaṅ, savetna hdipna rampes
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅa</rdg></app>, <app><lem wit="#A">ya ta sinaṅguh tri-kaya mandala parisuda ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita</lem><note>Both manuscripts share this passage. However, <ptr target="#B"/> has an extention: <foreign>hana ta ya saṁ hyiṁ tri-kaya mandala [...] cai pari ṅaran:iṁ bvana, suda ṅaran:iṁ pvaE, Ugas bvana lambha, mətu bvana paR̥k· tri ṅaran:iṅ hulu, kaya ṅaran:iṁ tri-kaya mandala parisuda, ṅa, byitanyi, kayatnak:ən· na saṁ sevaka darma</foreign>. Probably <ptr target="#B"/> represents an original text, but I cannot reconstruct the passage since the manuscript is too damage.</note></app>, 3.</p>
.<listApp type="parallels">
855 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_13.04"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_13.04">SiGu 13.4</ref>: <foreign>ambək paśānta ṅaranya, hayva daṇḍakara, hiri payogya, ri paḍanya janma, hayva jahət ambək, ṅahanakən ambək menak, ambək heraṅ, ambek rahayu, ya ambək paśānta ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
.</listApp>
. </div>
860<div type="chapter" n="21" xml:id="smg_21">
.<head type="editorial">Four Types of Goodness (<foreign>catur-rahayu</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_21.01">ini catur-rahayu ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">silokanya</lem><rdg wit="#B">silo<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> nihan, <q>mas pirak komala hintən</q>, kaliṅanya,
. <app><lem type="conj">mas ta ma ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, sabda tuhu təpət <pb edRef="#A" n="18v"/>
865 <app><lem wit="#A">bənər</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nir</rdg></app>, byakta pañcaksara, pirak ta ma ṅaranna, ambək
. <app><lem type="emn">krəta</lem><rdg wit="#A">krata</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">yogya</lem><rdg wit="#B">yvagaya</rdg></app> rahayu, komala ta ma ṅaranna,
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəIna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gyəna</rdg></app> caaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">padaṅ, heraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">padaṁ<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ləga loganda aṅən-aṅənna,
870 <app><lem type="emn">hintən</lem><rdg wit="#A">həniṁ</rdg></app> ma ṅaranna, caṅciṅ səri<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> səmu imut<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> səmu guyu, rame ambək.</p>
.<listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SKK_14.04"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaKandangKaresian.xml#skk_14.04">SKK 14.4</ref>: <foreign>ini silokana, mas, pirak, komala, hintən, ya ta saṅ hyaṅ catur-yogya ṅaranna, ini kaliṅanna, mas ma ṅaranya, sabda tuhu, təpət byakta, pañcaksara, pirak ma ṅaranya, ambək krəta yogya rahayu, komala ma ṅaranya, gəiṅna padaṅ caaṅ, ləga-loganda, hintən ma ṅaranya, caṅciṅ səri, səmu imuc, rame ambək, ya ta sinaṅguh catur-yogya ṅaranya.</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
875</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_21.02">ini
. <app><lem wit="#A">artana dəi</lem><rdg wit="#A"><lacunaEnd/>dəI</rdg></app>, nu kaṅkən mas ta ma, na kanaka jatirupa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nu kaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> pirak
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta ma</lem><rdg wit="#B">tasra</rdg></app>, na manik
880 <app><lem type="emn">sarvesta</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">savesṭā</rdg></app>, nu
. <app><lem wit="#A">kaṅkən komala</lem><rdg wit="#B">kaṁkən<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ta ma, na manik nirguna, nu kaṅkən
. <app><lem type="norm">hintən</lem><rdg wit="#A">hitən</rdg></app> ta ma, na kanaka santaṅva, ya ta sinaṅguh catur-rahayu, ṅa.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="22" xml:id="smg_22">
885<head type="editorial">Ten Virtues (<foreign>dasa-sila</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_22.01">ini ma iña hayu na
. <app><lem wit="#A">təmən, diṅaranan</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical"><lacunaEnd/>dipajarkən</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> dasa-sila, dasa ta ma sapuluh, sila ta
. <app><lem wit="#A">ma ṅaranna</lem><rdg wit="#B">maḥ</rdg></app> guna, byaktanya nihan,
890 <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śrotra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sotra</rdg><rdg wit="#B">svaṭā</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cakṣuh</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">caksuḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">cak·su</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">ghrāṇa</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">gərna</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">jihvā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">jəhva</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vak</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem><term xml:lang="san-Latn">vāk</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">vak</rdg><rdg wit="#B">jihva</rdg></app>,
895 <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">tvak</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">təvək</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pani</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem><term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāṇi</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">pani</rdg><rdg wit="#B">tava<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">pastha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">pasṭā</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāyu</term>,
. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāda</term>, ya ta dasa-sila ṅaranna.</p>
.</div>
900<div type="chapter" n="23" xml:id="smg_23">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Paths (<foreign>dasa-marga</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_23.01">ini dasa-marga ṅaranna,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śrotra</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">sotra</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ taliṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">apa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>pa</rdg></app> visayaniṅ taliṅa, siṅ hala siṅ
905 <app><lem type="norm">sa<pb edRef="#A" n="19r"/>lahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">salaḥkən·na,</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">rəṅəakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">R̥ṅəAkən·na</rdg><rdg wit="#B">R̥ṅəAkən·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cakṣuh</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">caksuḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">caksu</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ mata,
. <app><lem wit="#B">apa visayaniṅ mata,</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">sala<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ya hayu
910 <app><lem type="norm">toṅtonakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">tvaṁtvan·aknə</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">ghrāṇa</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">gərna</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ iruṅ, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥknə</rdg></app>, siṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">hayu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>yu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">ambuṅakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">AmbhuṁAknə</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">jihvā</term> ṅaraniṅ lidah, siṅ hala siṅ
915 <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥkən·na</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">rasaakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">rasaAknə</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">vāk</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">vak</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">tutuk</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ suṅut, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">salaḥkən:a</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">sabdaakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabdaAknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vək<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
920 <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">tvak</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">təvək</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ kulit, apa visayaniṅ kulit, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥknə</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">prəsaakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">prəsaAknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>kən:a</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāṇi</term> ṅaraniṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">taṅan</lem><rdg wit="#B">taṅa</rdg></app>, apa visayaniṅ taṅan, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">salahkən:a</rdg></app>, ya hayu
925 <app><lem type="norm">gaməlakəna, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāyu</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">gaməl·Aknə, payu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gəməlakən:a, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ tumbuṅ, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥAknə</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">isiṅakəna, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pastha</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">IsiṁAknə, pasṭā</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>pasṭā</rdg></app> ṅaraniṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">purusa</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">pəlat·</rdg></app>, apa visayaniṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">purusa</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">pəlat·</rdg></app>, siṅ hala siṅ
930 <app><lem type="emn">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">salaḥkən·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">siṁ</rdg></app> hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">uyuhakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">Uyuḥhaknə</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāda</term> ṅaraniṅ suku, apa visayaniṅ suku, siṅ hala siṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">salahakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">salaḥhaknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">salaḥkən:a</rdg></app>, ya hayu
. <app><lem type="norm">lakuakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">lakuAknə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lakuAkən:a</rdg></app>, ya
935 <app><lem wit="#B">ta sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> dasa-<app><lem wit="#A">marga <pb edRef="#A" n="19v"/> ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B">marga<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="24" xml:id="smg_24">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Faculties (<foreign>dasa-indriya</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_24.01">ini ma dasa-indriya, ṅa,
940 <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">śrotra</lem><rdg wit="#A">sotra</rdg></app>-indriya</term>, haneṅ taliṅa, sanika
. <app><lem wit="#A">pananta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ta</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">ya karana</lem><rdg wit="#A">kuruṅan·</rdg></app> saṅ hyaṅ atma,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ṅarəṅə paknanya,</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">cakṣuh-indriya</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">caksuḥ Indriya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">caksu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">haneṅ mata</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">ṅaraniṁ panvan·</rdg></app>, sanika
945 <app><lem wit="#A">pananta</lem><rdg wit="#B">panan·<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ya karana saṅ hyaṅ atma, pamətuan
. <app><lem wit="#A">ikaṅ hədap</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>hidapa</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">manoṅton rupavarna paknanya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">ghrāṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">gərna</rdg></app>-indriya</term> haneṅ iruṅ, sanika pananta,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ya ta</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> karana saṅ hyaṅ atma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">maṅambuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Aṅabuṁ</rdg></app> paknanya,
950 <app><lem wit="#A">pamətuan ikaṅ hədap</lem><rdg wit="#B">pamətvan·nikaṁ hidap</rdg></app>. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">jihvā-indriya</term> haneṅ lidah, sanika pananta, ya karana saṅ hyaṅ atma, ṅarasa <!-- OS --> sad-rasa paknanya, pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">vāk-indriya</term> haneṅ tutuk, sanika pananta, ya karana saṅ hyaṅ atma, mañabda paknanya, pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">tvak</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">təvək</rdg></app>-indriya</term> ha<app><lem wit="#A">neṅ kulit, sanika pananta, ya karana saṅ hyaṅ atma, pamrasa paknanya,</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāṇi-<pb edRef="#A" n="20r"/>indriya</term> haneṅ taṅan, sanika ri pananta, ya karana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> atma, magaməl paknanya, pamətuan ika hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāyu-<app><lem type="norm">indriya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Idriya</rdg></app></term> haneṅ lət, sanika ri pananta, karana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> atma, maṅhətut paknanya, pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">pastha</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">pasṭā</rdg></app>-<app><lem type="norm">indriya</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Idriya</rdg></app></term> haneṅ purusa, sanika ri pananta, ya karana saṅ hyaṅ atma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">paknanya pasuklasvanita lavan maṅəyəh</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">Anada Aṅəyə pa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="3"/></rdg></app>, pamətuan ikaṅ hədap. <term xml:lang="san-Latn">pāda-indriya</term> haneṅ suku,
. <app><lem wit="#A">sanika pananta, ya karana saṅ
955 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> atma, lumaku paknanya, pamətuan ikaṅ hədap, ya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> ta sinaṅguh dasa-<app><lem type="norm">indriya</lem><rdg wit="#A">sila</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">Idriya</rdg></app> ṅa.</p>
.
.
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="25" xml:id="smg_25">
960<head type="editorial">Ten Personalisations (<foreign>dasa-paṅaku</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_25.01">ini dasa-paṅaku ṅaranna, inakunya ata ya paṅruṅunya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">panonya</lem><rdg wit="#B">panvan·tvanya</rdg></app>, paṅambuṅnya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">pamastunya</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, <app><lem type="emn">pamrəsanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pavrisanya</rdg></app>,

965 <app><lem wit="#A">paṅlakunya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ya</rdg></app>, hana saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">maṅaku</lem><rdg wit="#B">maṅabuṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere">hana saṅ maṅrəṅə, hana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> manik kumambaṅ, <pb edRef="#A" n="20v"/> ya dasa-paṅaku ṅaranna.</lem><witDetail type="retained" wit="#A"/><rdg wit="#B">hana saṅ maṅabuṁ, hana saṁ maṅR̥ṅə, hana saṁ hyi manikumaṁbaṁ, hana visesaku, hana prəmanaku, hana saṅ manon·tvan· ha

.<div type="chapter" n="26" xml:id="smg_26">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Highest Principles (<foreign>dasa-utama</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_26.01"><app><lem wit="#A">ini</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> dasa-utama ṅaranna, byaktanya nihan, hana
975 <app><lem type="norm">śrotra</lem><rdg wit="#A">svaṭāḥ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hana rəṅə</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>na R̥ṅə</rdg></app>, hana saṅ maṅrəṅə, hana utama, hana cakṣuh, hana tumon, hana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">matumon</lem><rdg wit="#A">tumvan</rdg><rdg wit="#B">,atumvan</rdg></app>, hana
. <app><lem wit="#A">utama,</lem><rdg wit="#B">Utama, Ana prə<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg><note>Ms <ptr target="#B"/> systematically has <foreign>hana prəmana</foreign> juxtaposed to <foreign>hana utama</foreign>.</note></app> <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere">hana
. <app><lem type="norm">ghrāṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">grəna</rdg></app>, hana paṅambuṅ,
980 <app><lem type="conj">hana saṅ maṅambuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hanam·buṁ</rdg></app>, hana utama, hana
. <app><lem type="emn">jihvā</lem><rdg wit="#A">jəhva</rdg></app>, hana rasa, hana saṅ maṅrasa, hana utama, hana
. <app><lem type="conj">vāk</lem><rdg wit="#A">tuturraknə</rdg></app>, hana śabda, hana saṅ mañabda, hana utama, hana
. <app><lem type="norm">tvak</lem></app>, hana mrəsa, hana saṅ mrəsa, hana utama, hana pāṇi, hana gaməl, hana saṅ maṅgaməl, hana utama,
. <app><lem type="conj">hana pāyu, hana ṅisiṅ, hana saṅ maṅisiṅ, hana utama</lem><rdg wit="#A">hana payu hana ṅisiṁ, hana Utama</rdg></app>,
985 <app><lem type="conj">hana pastha, hana ṅuyuh, hana saṅ maṅuyuh, hana utama</lem><rdg wit="#A">ha<space type="binding-hole"/>na pasṭā hana ṅuyuḥ, hana Utama</rdg></app>, hana pāda, hana laku, hana saṅ maṅlaku, hana utama, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-utama, ṅa.</lem><witDetail type="retained" wit="#A"/><note type="altLem">hana ghrāṇa...dasa-utama, ṅa.</note><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="11"/>ñabda, Ana Utama, Ana prəmana, Ana jiho Ana rasa, Ana saṁ maṁrasa Ana Utama, ana prəmana, Ana pani Ana gaməl·<gap reason="lost" quantity="6" unit="character"/>Ana Utama, Ana prəmana, Ana pasṭā Ana Uyu, Ana saṁ maṁṅuyu Ana Utama, Ana prəmana, Ana bayu, Ana <gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="11"/>Ana prəma<add place="below">na</add>, ya ta sinaṁguḥ dasa-Uta<add place="below">ma</add>, ṅa,</rdg></app></p>

.<div type="chapter" n="27" xml:id="smg_27">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Pacified Acts (<foreign>dasa-pasanta</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_27.01">ini
990 <app><lem wit="#B">dasa-pasanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">dasapasta</rdg></app> ṅaranya, byaktanya nihan, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">dāna</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">śīla</term>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kṣānti</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">santi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">syin·ti</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">vīrya</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">vəryi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">v<unclear>i</unclear>rya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">dhyāna</term></lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B">byina</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">prajñā, karuṇā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">praña, karuna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pra<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">muditā</term>,
995 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">metrī</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">mestri</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">upekṣā</term>.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app><note corresp="txt:SiGu_11.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_11.01">SiGu 11.1</ref>: <foreign>kurvanti katayan dharma, gavayakna sakagavayan saṅ hyaṅ dharma, lvirnya ta nihan, dāna, śīla, kṣānti, vīrya, dhyāna, prajñā, karuṇā, muditā, metrī, upekṣā</foreign>.</note><note corresp="txt:SKK_14.3"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaKandangKaresian.xml#skk_14.03">SKK 14.3</ref>: <foreign>sakitu na dasa-pasanta, gəs ma guna, nama, hook, pesok, asih, karuña, mukpruk, ṅulas, ñəcəp, ṅala aṅən, ña mana suka buṅah, padaṅ caaṅ nu dipivaraṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh parigəiṅ ṅaranna.</foreign></note></app>
.</listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_27.02">ka, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">dāna</term> ṅaranya, maṅka
1000 <app><lem type="emn">ṅənah tinəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅinaḥ tiniṁ</rdg></app> ka nu reya,
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">śīla</term> ṅaranya,</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">vi<pb edRef="#A" n="21r"/>hikan tvah</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic"><lacunaEnd/>barya kabyisan· di ram·pes tyaḥ</rdg></app>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">vīrya</lem><rdg wit="#A">viryi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kyiti</rdg></app></term> ṅaranya, <app><lem type="emn">prih</lem><rdg wit="#A">vri</rdg><note>My emendation is based on the occurrence of <foreign>prih</foreign> on the next clause.</note></app> təhər duga-duga,
. <app><lem type="norm">prih</lem><rdg wit="#A">pri</rdg></app> miguna na pirampesən,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">dhyāna</term> ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A">byana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">di tə<unclear>mba</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ñaho di tinəṅ di maneh,
1005 <app><lem type="norm"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">prajñā</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">prəña</rdg></app> ṅaranna,
. <app><lem wit="#A">usən ṅalaan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> ṅalaan</rdg></app> pimalaən di
. <app><lem wit="#A">sarira</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">raga</rdg></app> soraṅan,
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">karuṇā</term> ṅaranya,</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> beṅkeṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">gəiṅna</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəIna</rdg><rdg wit="#B">gyəna</rdg></app> dek mitinəṅkən maneh, dəṅ mumul
1010 <app><lem wit="#B">ñiar</lem><rdg wit="#A">ñyə</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">pirisiən</lem><rdg wit="#B">pikari<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> sakalih, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">muditā</term> ṅaranya, hantə lipi di pikabisaən
. <app><lem wit="#A">nu reya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> rye</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">metrī</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">mestri</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ñaho
. <app><lem wit="#A">guna</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">diguna</rdg></app> rahayu, pakən ṅənah tinəṅ ka nu reya, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">upekṣā</term> ṅaranya, tə beṅkeṅ ku goce ku
1015 <app><lem wit="#A">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#B">ra<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-pasanta ṅaranya.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_11.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_11.02">SiGu 11.2</ref>: <foreign>ka, dāna ṅaranya, mere enak ambək di paḍanya janma, śīla, ṅa, vihikan aṅalap kasor, kṣānti, ṅa, vihikan anupakṣama, vīrya, ṅa, utsāha ri kagavayaniṅ hayu, tambəhana hayunya muvah, dhyāna, ṅa, umiṅətakən arthaniṅ paramārtha, prajñā, ṅa, utsāha ri kahilaṅaniṅ daśakleśa ri śarīranya, karuṇā, ṅa, larāmbəknyāmaṅguhakən duhkhaniṅ len, muditā, ṅa, tar kepvan masukhaniṅ len, metrī, ṅa, vruh gumavayakna mimitiniṅ dadi inak ambhəknikaṅ len, upekṣā, ṅa, tar grah iri hala hayu</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1020</listApp>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="28" xml:id="smg_28">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Grounds (<foreign>dasa-bumi</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_28.01">ini ma iña na pigunaən
1025 <app><lem wit="#A">təmən, nu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> nu</rdg></app> dipajarkən dasa-bumi, nihan silokanya,</p>
.
.<lg xml:id="smg_28.02" xml:lang="san-Latn" met="free_octosyllabic">
.<l n="1">agəm rahayəm
. <app><lem wit="#A">gunyam</lem><rdg wit="#B">paniqəm</rdg></app>,</l>
1030<l n="2"><app><lem wit="#A">tvah citane haləm</lem><rdg wit="#B">tecaptaneḥha<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,</l>
.<l n="3"><app><lem type="emn">kurvanti</lem><rdg wit="#A">kuruvati</rdg></app> kuśalam mahat.</l>
.</lg>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_28.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">gavayakən ika kusala visesa, kusala
1035 <app><lem wit="#A">visesa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>sesa</rdg></app> ṅaranya, asih<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> <pb edRef="#A" n="21v"/>bakti,
. <app><lem wit="#B">prəyatna</lem><rdg wit="#A">grəyatna</rdg></app>, gorava<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> duga-duga,
. <app><lem wit="#A">santa</lem><rdg wit="#B">pasanta</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> karuna,
. <app><lem wit="#A">anumoda</lem><rdg wit="#B">Anamoda</rdg></app>, anumana,
. <app><lem type="emn">aləmbana</lem><rdg wit="#A">AL̥mba</rdg><rdg wit="#B">aL̥m·ba<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> atəaṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-bumi ṅaranya.
1040 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app><note corresp="txt:SiGu_12.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_12.01">SiGu 12.1</ref>: <foreign>kurvanti kuśalam mahat, gavayakna kaṅ kuśala viśeṣa, kuśala viśeṣa, ṅa, asih bhakti prayatna, gorava duga-duga, śānta karuṇā ika, anumāna, anumoda, ālambana atvaṅ, ya sinaṅguh daśabhūmi, ṅa, abhyāsa lagi-lagi saṅ paṇḍita, ikaṅ ambək maṅkana</foreign>.</note></app></listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="29" xml:id="smg_29">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Superiorities (<foreign>dasa-visesa</foreign>)</head>
1045<p xml:id="smg_29.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ini dasa-visesa
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya, artanya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅa, Artanyi</rdg></app> nihan, saṅ hyaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">śrotra</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">sotra</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem wit="#B">karəṅə</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaR̥ṅi</rdg></app>, apan
. <app><lem wit="#A">sira</lem><rdg wit="#B">ika</rdg></app> saṅ maṅrəṅə, saṅ hyaṅ tan pakarəṅə,
1050 <app><lem type="emn">hiyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hyi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hya</rdg></app> cakṣuh tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">katoṅton</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, apan
. <app><lem type="conj">sira</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app> saṅ matumon, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem type="emn">pakatiṅalan</lem><rdg wit="#A">katiṅalan</rdg></app>,
1055 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem>ghrāṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">gərna</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">tan kaambuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">tan· kaAm·baṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>n kaAmbhuṁ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">apan</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apa<add place="below">na</add></rdg></app> sira saṅ maṅambuṅ, saṅ hyaṅ tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">pakaambuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">pakaAbuṁ</rdg></app>,
1060 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> jihvā tan karasa, apan sira saṅ maṅrasa, saṅ hyaṅ tan pakarasa,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> vāk tan kasabda, apan sira saṅ mañabda,
. <app><lem type="norm">saṅ hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">saṁ <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> tan pakasabda, hyaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">tvak</lem><rdg wit="#A">təvək</rdg></app> tan kaprəsa, apan sira
. <app><lem type="emn">saṅ amrəsa</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṁṅ amrə</rdg></app>, saṅ
1065 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tan pakaprasa,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāṇi tan kagaməl, apan sira saṅ maṅgaməl, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem type="emn">pakagaməl</lem><rdg wit="#A">pagaməl·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāyu tan kaisiṅ, apan sira saṅ maṅisiṅ, saṅ
1070 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tan pakaisiṅ,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pastha<pb edRef="#A" n="22r"/> tan kauyuh, apan sira saṅ maṅuyuh,
. <app><lem type="conj">saṅ hyaṅ tan pakauyuh</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāda tan lumaku, apan sira saṅ malaku, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> tan pakalaku, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-visesa ṅa.</p>
1075</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="30" xml:id="smg_30">
.<head type="editorial">Ten Great Superiorities (<foreign>dasa-mahavisesa</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_30.01">ini ma dasa-mahavisesa, eta, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app>
1080 <app><lem type="emn">śrotra</lem><rdg wit="#A">grərna</rdg></app> inavakanta, mana visesa ku nu mahavisesa, eta, saṅ hyaṅ cakṣuh inavakanta, mana visesa ku nu mahavisesa eta, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">ghrāṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">grəna</rdg></app> inavakanta, mana visesa ku nu
. <app><lem wit="#A">mahavisesa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>visesa</rdg></app> eta,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> jihvā inavakanta, mana visesa ma ku nu mahavisesa
1085 <app><lem wit="#A">eta,</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan hana visesa <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> vāk inavakanta, mana
. <app><lem type="emn">visesa</lem><rdg wit="#A">vises·</rdg></app> ku nu mahavisesa eta,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">tvak</lem><rdg wit="#A">təvək·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>vak</rdg></app> inavakanta, mana visesa ma, ku nu mahavisesa, tan vənaṅ visesa eta,
1090 <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere"><app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāṇi inavakanta, mana
. <app><lem type="emn">visesa</lem><rdg wit="#A">vasesa</rdg></app> ma, ku nu mahavisesa,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāyu inavakanta, mana visesa ma, ku nu mahavise<pb edRef="#A" n="22v"/>sa, tan hana visesa, eta,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pastha inavakanta, mana visesa ma, ku nu mahavisesa,
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pāda inavakanta, mana visesa ma, ku nu maha visesa, tan hana visesa, eta, ya ta sinaṅguh dasa-mahavisesa ṅa.</lem><witDetail type="retained" wit="#A"/><note type="altLem">hyaṅ pāṇi...mahavisesa ṅa</note><rdg wit="#B">hyi pasṭā Inavakan·ta<gap reason="lost" quantity="50" unit="character"/>mana visesa, ku nu mahavisesa tan hana visesa Eta, hyi pada Inavakan·ta manavisesa, ku nu maha<gap reason="lost" quantity="23" unit="character"/></rdg></app></p>
1095</div>
.

.<div type="chapter" n="31" xml:id="smg_31">
1105<head type="editorial">Ten Non Superiorities (<foreign>dasa-tan-kavisesa</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_31.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">ini</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">dasa-tan-kavisesa</lem><rdg wit="#A">dasavisesa</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="1"/>sa tan kavisesa</rdg></app> ṅaranya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">artanya nihan, tan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> hana
. <app><lem type="norm">srotra</lem></app>, tan hana inavakanta, tan hana
1110 <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>papanta, tan hana cakṣuh, tan hana
. <app><lem wit="#A">inavakanta</lem><rdg wit="#B">I<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, tan hana <app><lem type="norm">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka</rdg></app>papanta kalesanta, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">ha</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">ghrāṇa</lem><rdg wit="#A">gərna</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj">tan hana inavakanta</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>navakanta</rdg></app>, tan hana
1115 <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>papanta, tan hana jihvā,
. <app><lem wit="#B">tan hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">tan:a</rdg></app> inavakanta, tan hana
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakapapanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkapapanta</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinakapapan·<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, tan hana vak<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> tan hana inavakanta,
. <app><lem type="conj">tan hana pinakapapa-kalesanta</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">tan· hana pinaḥkapapanta, tan· hana vak tan· hana vakanta, tan· hana pinaḥka papakalesata</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ta,</rdg></app>, tan hana təvək, tan hana inavakanta, <pb edRef="#A" n="23r"/> tan hana
. <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>papanta, <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere">tan hana pāṇi, tan hana inavakanta, tan hana
1120 <app><lem type="norm">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka</rdg></app>papanta,
. <app><lem type="conj">tan hana pāyu, tan hana inavakanta, tan hana pinakapapanta</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><note>It seems that this is the case of Eye skip of the <foreign>pa</foreign> in <foreign>pāyu</foreign>, jump to <foreign>pastha</foreign>.</note></app>, tan hana pastha, tan hana inavakanta, tan hana
. <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>papanta, tan hana pāda<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> tan hana inavakanta, tan hana
. <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app><app><lem wit="#A">papanta, kabeh</lem><rdg wit="#B">pa<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</lem><witDetail wit="#A" type="retained"/><note type="altLem">tan hana pāṇi...papanta, kabeh</note><rdg wit="#B">tan hana pasṭā tan hana Ina<gap reason="lost" quantity="20" unit="character"/>kan·ta, tan hana pinakapapan·ta, tan hana pada, tan· hana Inavakan·ta, tan· hana pinakapa<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="2"/></rdg></app></p>
.<p xml:id="smg_31.02">ka, tan
1125 <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg></app> rəṅə, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg></app> rupa, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg></app>

1130 <app><lem wit="#B">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg></app> prasa, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> guna, tan

. <app><lem type="emn">hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">na</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>
1135 <app><lem type="emn">rasa</lem><rdg wit="#A">prasa</rdg><rdg wit="#B">purna</rdg></app>, tan na
. <app><lem type="emn">kahyunya</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="lexical">kahyaṅanya kabeh</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kahiyunya <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn" rend="hyphenright">dasa</lem><rdg wit="#A">sa-</rdg></app>-tan-kavisesa ṅaranya.</p>
