.<div type="chapter" n="32" xml:id="smg_32">
1140<head type="editorial">Four Principles (<foreign>catur-utama</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_32.01">muvah nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">pavarah</lem><rdg wit="#A">pavərah</rdg></app> mami saṅ sevaka darma, hana ta saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> catur-mulia ṅaranya, ya catur-utama ṅa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">artanya nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> nihan</rdg></app>,
1145 <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>parahu,
. <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pidaḥka-</rdg></app>banava,
. <app><lem type="emn">pi<pb edRef="#A" n="23v"/>naka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥ-</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>bahetra,
. <app><lem wit="#B" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥ-</rdg></app>joṅ. nu
. <app><lem wit="#B">kaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kakən</rdg></app> parahu ta ma,
1150 <app><lem wit="#A">na ulah</lem><rdg wit="#B">na U<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> pasanta, nu
. <app><lem type="norm">kaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kakən</rdg></app> banava ta ma, na sabda pasanta, nu
. <app><lem type="norm">kaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kakən</rdg></app> bahetra ta ma, na ambək pasanta,
. <app><lem type="norm">nu kaṅkən</lem><rdg wit="#A">nu kakən</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> kaṁkən·</rdg></app> joṅ ta ma,
. <app><lem type="norm">na gəiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəI</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">gəIna</rdg></app> atisti pasanta, sira ta saṅ sida
1155 <app><lem wit="#A">jati ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B">jati <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, saṅ yogisvara ṅaranya, sira ta saṅ pandita ṅaranira, sira saṅ viku ṅaranira, ya ta sinaṅguh catur-mulya, ya ta catur-utama ṅaranya.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SiGu_08.05"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSiksaGuru.xml#siksaguru_08.05">SiGu 8.5</ref>: <foreign>om saṅ hyaṅ trikāyopaśānta atah ika abhyāsanta, mvaṅ lagi-laginta, apan maṅke hələm-hələmniṅ hələm, saṅ hyaṅ trikāyopaśānta atah ika gəgənta, ya ta pinakaparahu, pinakabahitra, pinakabanava, makaparahu ñāna paśānta, makabanava karma paśānta, makabahitra śabda paśānta, sira ta saṅ sādhu jāti ṅaranira, sira saṅ yogīśvara ṅaranira, sira saṅ paṇḍita, saṅ viku ṅaranira, mapa ruktinika, livat ta ya pinakapariṇāma de saṅ paṇḍita</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1160</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="33" xml:id="smg_33">
.<head type="editorial">Pure Thought (<foreign>cipta nirmala</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_33.01"><app><lem wit="#A">ini</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ni</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app>
1165 <app><lem wit="#B">cipta</lem><rdg wit="#A">catur</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">nirmala</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ya saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> manik
. <app><lem wit="#B">nirmala</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala</rdg></app> suda ma
. <app><lem wit="#B">həniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">həniṁ</rdg></app>, saṅ
1170 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi</rdg></app> manik
. <app><lem type="norm">nirmala suda</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala suda</rdg><rdg wit="#B">nirmala <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ma lilaṅ, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> manik
. <app><lem type="emn">nirmala</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala</rdg></app> suda ma putih, ya saṅ cita
. <app><lem type="emn">nirmala</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərmala</rdg></app>.</p>
1175<p xml:id="smg_33.02">nihan muvah kayatnakna, hana ya
. <app><lem type="emn">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">vvatniṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ni</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">rampes</lem><rdg wit="#A">rapes</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ya saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">endah</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Edaḥ</rdg></app> laraṅan, ṅa, ya saṅ hyaṅ hayu, ṅa.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_33.03">ini
1180 <app><lem wit="#A">kaləpasənana</lem><rdg wit="#B">ka<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ṅaranya, saṅ hyaṅ nirmala, ya catur-mokta ṅaranya, ləpas, ləñəp,
. <app><lem type="norm">mokta</lem><rdg wit="#A">mokta</rdg></app>,<pb edRef="#A" n="24r"/> hilaṅ, ya ta catur-<app><lem type="norm">mokta</lem><rdg wit="#A">mokta</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ya ika
. <app><lem type="emn">rahaseyakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">raseyakəna</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>hasyakən·ni</rdg></app> saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="34" xml:id="smg_34">
1185<head type="editorial">Words <foreign>ndah saṅ hyaṅ hayu</foreign></head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_34.01">ini sad ro, artanya ndah saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">hyaṅ hayu</lem><rdg wit="#B">hyi <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj">ka</lem><rdg wit="#A">ka, ta, A,</rdg></app>, nu nən ta ma, upamana ratu
1190 <app><lem type="emn">humidəp</lem><rdg wit="#A">humihdəp</rdg></app>, umaṅən-aṅən sabuatna di saṅ hyaṅ siṅasana,
. <app><lem type="emn">bijil</lem><rdg wit="#A">bjal·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>jil</rdg></app> ti na paṅatistian, ya ta nən ṅaranya, nu dah ta ma, dek
. <app><lem wit="#A">nugrahakən na</lem><rdg wit="#B">nugraḥhakən· <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> drabya, ka saṅ prəbu, rama, rəsi, disi, mvaṅ tarahan, nu saṅ ta ma, basana soraṅan, tan hana karonya ṅuni, katəlunya
. <app><lem type="emn">vanehan</lem><rdg wit="#A">vireḥhan·</rdg></app>, basana
. <app><lem wit="#A">hyaṅ ta ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> ta ma</rdg></app>, urut
1195 <app><lem wit="#B">nu</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ti həla, basana hayu ta ma, basana hampaṅ, kadi
. <app><lem type="emn">pusuh</lem><rdg wit="#A">kupusuḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">pusu</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">kadi kapuk</lem><rdg wit="#B">kadi <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, sarirana, ya ta ma iña nu rampes, 7, 2, ya ta saṅ aroṅe.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_34.02">ini ro artana, basana
. <app><lem type="emn">lanaṅ hiji</lem><rdg wit="#A">laṁna hiji</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> hiji</rdg></app>, vadon hiji, ro, ṅa, tri
1200 <app><lem wit="#A">artanya</lem><rdg wit="#B">Antanya</rdg></app>, iñana prəbu rama rəsi, 3, lima
. <app><lem type="norm">artanya, brahma</lem><rdg wit="#A">Artana, braḥma</rdg><rdg wit="#B">AR̥tanya <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, visnu, isva<pb edRef="#A" n="24v"/>ra, mahadeva, sivah saṅkara,
. <app><lem type="conj">kusika</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">garga<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> mestri</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>mes·tri</rdg></app>, purusya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem wit="#A">patañjala</lem><rdg wit="#B">patajala</rdg></app>,
1205 <app><lem type="emn">indra</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Idra</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> yama<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> baruna, kovera<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> besavarna, ya ta pañca-devata
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya, pitu</lem><rdg wit="#B">ṅa, 5 <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> artanya, sapta-patala, sapta-bvana, sapta-svarga, sapta-sunya,
. <app><lem type="emn">kanirasrayan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kanisriIyasan·</rdg></app>, ya ta kalpa-<app><lem wit="#A" rend="hyphenleft">carita ṅaranya, 7</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ṅa, nyi,</rdg></app>.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="35" xml:id="smg_35">
1210<head type="editorial">Three Knowledges (<foreign>tiga-ajñana</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.01">ini tiga
. <app><lem wit="#B">di</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> nu reya ṅaranna, tiga paksa, 3, tiga anavasta, 3,
. <app><lem wit="#A">paṅajñanaan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, 4,
. <app><lem type="emn">añana ginavay-gavay</lem><rdg wit="#A">Añana ginavay</rdg><rdg wit="#B">paṅAñana ginavay· gavay·</rdg></app>,
1215 <app><lem wit="#A">4, ini</lem><rdg wit="#B">4, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> bayu sabda hdip, di nu reya, nu
. <app><lem type="emn">narivrəta</lem><rdg wit="#A">nalivrəta</rdg></app> di bvana, nu ñəluman ka kayu
. <app><lem wit="#A">ka batu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> batu</rdg></app> ka ləmah ka cai, ka sarva tumuvuh, ka sarva satva, 3.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.02">ini tiga di saṅ pandita, ṅaranna, tiga sadana, tiga
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta ma</lem><rdg wit="#B">ta <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> təlu, sadana ta ma drabya.</p>
1220<p xml:id="smg_35.03">ini tiga təpət ṅaranna, ini a, ini ña, ini na, ya ta sinaṅguh tiga
. <app><lem wit="#A">təpət basa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> basa</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.04"><app><lem type="norm">ndya</lem><rdg wit="#A">nədyi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">nən·dya</rdg></app> kapaṅguhan ikaṅ tiga ri <app><lem wit="#A">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">maha</rdg></app> pandita,<pb edRef="#A" n="25r"/> kasihana ranak devata saṅ ulun, ri kapaṅguhanikaṅ a,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">ni<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ña, nikaṅ na.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
1225 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.07"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.07">SHH 3.7</ref>: <foreign>ndya kapaṅguhaniṅ tiga təpət liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, kasihana ranak saṅ paṇḍita, i kapaṅguhana, nyaṅ a, nyaṅ jñā, nyaṅ na</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.05" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">aum, nihan ta, kami
1230 <app><lem type="conj">mavarah patula</lem><rdg wit="#A">tula</rdg></app> beda rumuhun,
. <app><lem wit="#A">paṅavruhanta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>vruhan·ta</rdg></app> ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">təpətniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">katəpəttan·niṁ</rdg></app> tiga,
. <app><lem wit="#A">apa kari</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">Aparan ta</rdg></app> ṅaranikaṅ vuṅavari, srigadiṅ, asoka, tuduh denta,
. <app><lem type="norm">tuṅgal</lem><rdg wit="#A #B">tugal·</rdg></app>
1235 <app><lem wit="#A">kari ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">ka</rdg></app>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.08"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.08">SHH 3.8</ref>: <foreign>aum, mami mavarah ri kita, nihan patula beda mami rumuhun, paṅavruh i təpətniṅ tiga, sumahur saṅ tinakvanan, aparan ṅaranya vuṅavari, śrīgaḍiṅ, aṅsvaka, tuduh denta, tuṅgal i karika</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1240 </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">aum<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> beda
. <app><lem wit="#A">ika pvaṅkulun</lem><rdg wit="#B">Ika <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, vuṅavari ata vuṅavari, srigadiṅ ata srigadiṅ,
. <app><lem wit="#A">asoka</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>saka</rdg></app> ata asoka, pvaṅkulun,
. <app><lem wit="#A">səṅguh ika</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">səguhən·</rdg></app> vuvusta.
1245 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.09"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.09">SHH 3.9</ref>: <foreign>aum, abeda ika, pvaṅkulun, vuṅavari ata vuṅavari, śrīgaḍiṅ ata śrīgaḍiṅ, aṅsvaka ata ṅaranya aṅsvaka, pvaṅkulun, saṅguh ika vuvusta</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1250<p xml:id="smg_35.07" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem wit="#B">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#A">makana</rdg></app> tekaṅ tiga, panula beda
. <app><lem wit="#A">sarjava</lem><rdg wit="#B">sajarva</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">saduga-duga</lem><rdg wit="#A">sarduga-duga</rdg><rdg wit="#B">si duga-du<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">satəpət</lem><rdg wit="#A">sitəpət</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">saprətiaksa</lem><rdg wit="#A">siprətiaksa</rdg></app>.
1255 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.10"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.10">SHH 3.10</ref>: <foreign>maṅkana tekaṅ tiga, panula beda sarjava, saduga-duga, satəpət, sapratyakṣa</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1260<p xml:id="smg_35.08" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">ndah</lem><rdg wit="#A">da</rdg></app> nihan panula beda rumuhun, irikaṅ a,
. <app><lem wit="#A">apa kari</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ri ṅaran:ika</rdg></app> masuk mətu maṅhavan ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">gərna</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical"/></app> lavan riṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">tutukta</lem><rdg wit="#A">tutupta</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">upamāna</term></lem><rdg wit="#A #B">Unamana</rdg></app>
1265 <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">praveśanəm</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">pravek·sanim·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">prəvesanəm·</rdg></app>, gunanya
. <app><lem type="norm">ṅke ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅəṁke ra</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṅəke ri</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">sariranta</lem><rdg wit="#B">sariranyi</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.09"><app><lem wit="#A">bayu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> usvasa pvaṅkulun, ya tekaṅ a ṅaranya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> liṅ saṅ
. <app><lem wit="#A">pandita</lem><witDetail wit="#A" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#A">pantadi</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="ac"/></app>.
1270 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.11"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.11">SHH 3.11</ref>: <foreign>apa kari ṅaranikaṅ masuk, mətu, mahavan ri ruṅta lavan ri tutukta, upamana pravesanəm ṅkeri śārīranta, apa liṅta, bāyu ṅaranira pinaka-uśvāsa ranak saṅ paṇḍita, ya teka a, ṅaranya liṅ saṅ paṇḍita</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1275<p xml:id="smg_35.10" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan <app><lem type="emn">takonakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">takvanaknə</rdg></app> muvah
. <app><lem type="emn">ya terika</lem><rdg wit="#A">yan terika</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> teriya</rdg></app>, apa
. <app><lem wit="#A">kari</lem><rdg wit="#B">nikaṁ</rdg></app> ṅaranya, ikaṅ karəṅə, denya kari gərəh
. <app><lem wit="#A">gətərnikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">gətər i</rdg></app> sarvva janma, <pb edRef="#A" n="25v"/>
. <app><lem wit="#A">apa kari ṅaran</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">Ata kaR̥ṅə ta<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
1280 <app><lem type="emn">liṅta</lem><rdg wit="#A">L̥ṁta</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.11">sabda pvaṅkulun. ya tekaṅ ña ṅaranna liṅ saṅ pandita.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.12"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.12">SHH 3.12</ref>: <foreign>muvah nihan takvanakna mami ri kita, apa kari ṅaranikaṅ karəṅə denta ṅke ri bhuvana lavan rikaṅ sarva janma kabeh, karəṅə juga guṇanya, śabda ṅaranika panaṅguh ranak saṅ paṇḍita, ya tekaṅ jñā, ṅaranya liṅ saṅ paṇḍita</foreign>.</note>
1285 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.12" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">takonakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">takvan:aknə</rdg></app> muvah,
. <app><lem wit="#A">taya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ya</rdg></app>
1290 <app><lem wit="#A">vruh kari ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">vruhan· teriya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">apa ṅaran ika</lem><rdg wit="#A">Aparan· Ika</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">apa nikaṅ</rdg></app> tinəkakənta ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">vəkasnikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">vəkasanikaṅ</rdg></app> bvana, lvar, kidul, kulon, vetan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">sakədap</lem><rdg wit="#B">saka<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> humalivat ri tasik, ləs luṅa cəp təka muvah<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> apa kari liṅta anaku.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.13">hədap <app><lem wit="#A">pvaṅkulun</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>tan·</rdg></app>, ya tekaṅ na ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ pandita.
1295 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.13"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.13">SHH 3.13</ref>: <foreign>vaneh takvanakna mami ri kita, apa kari ṅaranikaṅ tinəkaknanta ri vəkasnikaṅ bhuvana lvar, kidul, kulvan, vetan, ləs luṅha sakədap humalivat i tasik, ciptaka muvah, apa ṅaranika liṅta, hədap ṅaranika, aṅən-aṅən ranak saṅ paṇḍita, ya teka na, ṅaranya liṅ saṅ paṇḍita</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1300<p xml:id="smg_35.14" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ya ta <app><lem wit="#B">mataṅyan</lem><rdg wit="#A">mataṅyi</rdg></app> sinaṅguh bayu sabda hdap ṅaranya, nu
. <app><lem wit="#B">guməlar</lem><rdg wit="#A">gular</rdg></app> di bvana, ya ta
. <app><lem wit="#A">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">sinaṅgu<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> tiga sadana ṅaranya, ya panəkakən ikaṅ rat
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakaandəlanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkaAdəlanikaṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">sarva</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>va</rdg></app> janma kabeh.</p>
1305<p xml:id="smg_35.15" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ini nu <app><lem wit="#A">vrəta</lem><rdg wit="#B">vruta</rdg></app> di sarira, bayu pinakahurip, masuk mətu riṅ ruṅta, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥ-</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">sinaṅguh</rdg></app>usvasanta,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ya sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#B">ya ta <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> təpət bənər, prətiyaksa, ya na təmən
. <app><lem type="emn">ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">ra</rdg></app> sarira ṅaranya, sabda ṅaranya, ikaṅ sabda, ya
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>paṅvastu ri
1310 <app><lem wit="#A">hala</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>la</rdg></app> hayu, paṅaranan ri svara
. <app><lem type="emn">byañjana</lem><rdg wit="#A">byaña</rdg><rdg wit="#B">byañana, kabeḥ</rdg></app>, ya
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka-</rdg></app>vuvusta, hədap ṅaranya, <app><lem type="conj">ikaṅ hədap, paṅaṅən-aṅənta ri madoh maparək</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B">pinaka hdap niṅ prəña, vijak<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
1315 <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.14"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.14">SHH 3.14</ref>: <foreign>mataṅyan kinalakaran ta ya təluṅ viji, ya sinaṅgah bāyu, śabda, hədap, bāyu ṅaranya ikaṅ bāyu, masuk mətu mahavan ri ruṅta pinakośvāsanta, śabda ṅaranya ikaṅ śabda ya pinakavuvusta, hədap ṅaranya ikaṅ hədap, paṅaṅən-aṅənta ri madvah maparək</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_35.16">a ma ṅaranya i<pb edRef="#A" n="26r"/>kaṅ bayu, ña ma ṅaranya ikaṅ sabda, na ma ṅaranya ikaṅ hədap, paṅəsinika tiga ajñana, ṅa, purba paksa saṅ pandita,
. <app><lem>upadesanakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apadesanakən</rdg></app>, tiga ta ma təlu,
1320 <app><lem wit="#A">ajñana ta</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> ta</rdg></app> ma nu kasampəran, ya ṅaran saṅ mahavisesa, 4.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_03.16"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_03.16">SHH 3.16</ref>: <foreign>aum, maṅkana pvaṅkulun, ndah yatika sinaṅgah mami ajñāna ṅaranya, a ṅaranya ikaṅ bāyu, jña ṅaranya ikaṅ śabda, na ṅaranya ikaṅ hədap, papisan ikaṅ tigaṅ viji.</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1325 </listApp>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="36" xml:id="smg_36">
.<head type="editorial">Real Knowledge (<foreign>ajñana jati</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_36.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndəh ya sinaṅguh
1330 <app><lem wit="#A">ajñana</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="orthographical">Añana</rdg></app> jati ṅaranya, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">kavənaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip"/></app> vinehakən
. <app><lem wit="#A">ri sisya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><unclear>ra sa</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, tan kavənaṅ ginavay-<app><lem type="emn">gavay</lem><rdg wit="#A">gay·</rdg></app>, ajñana ta ma, jati ta ma, puhun nu visesa, 4.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_36.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ini kamulyan,
. <app><lem type="emn">pavvitan</lem><rdg wit="#A">pavvatan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic"><lacunaEnd/>tan·, ṅa, ya vuIt·niṁ</rdg></app> suka lavan
1335 <app><lem wit="#B">enak</lem><rdg wit="#A">duka, Enak·,</rdg></app>, ya ta mataṅyan
. <app><lem wit="#A">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">vyatniṁ</rdg></app> sakti lavan bisa,
. <app><lem wit="#A">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">vyatniṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">kinatəaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kənatəaṁṅan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">kinatyəṁṅan·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">vya<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kinahanan, vvitniṅ sinəmbah riṅ saṅ pandita, ri hana bayu sabda hədap, ri sariranta,
1340 <app><lem wit="#A">yan ahilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic"><lacunaEnd/>ya hilaṁ</rdg></app> ikaṅ bayu sabda hədap,
. <app><lem wit="#A">ri</lem><rdg wit="#B">sakeṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">sariranta</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">sariranya məne</rdg></app>, mari sinəmbah, mari
. <app><lem type="emn">pinuja</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinujap·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">deniṅ rat kabeh</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅaranya</rdg></app>,
1345 <app><lem wit="#B">tinimpalakən riṅ səma</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_36.03">ikaṅ hədap
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem></app>hədapniṅ prəña, vicitra ikaṅ hədap, ya ta təpət <pb edRef="#A" n="26v"/> bənər ṅaranya, ya na təmən prətyaksa ri sarira
. <app><lem wit="#A">ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> ṅa</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#A">tiga</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="eye-skip"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> təpət ṅaranya, tiga ma təlu, təpət ta ma ṅaranya
1350 <app><lem type="emn">visesa</lem><rdg wit="#A">visesa, na</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">ya nu visesa</rdg></app>.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="37" xml:id="smg_37">
.<head type="editorial">Union (<foreign>katuṅgalan</foreign>)</head>
.
1355<p xml:id="smg_37.01">ini
. <app><lem type="norm">katuṅgalanana</lem><rdg wit="#A">katugalanana</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ktugalan·nana</rdg></app>, nu təpət
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta ma</lem><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> ya
. <app><lem wit="#A">paṅaṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">riṁ təpət· təmə<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> madoh maparək sakala <app><lem>hurip</lem><rdg wit="#A">huprab</rdg></app>nya, paranya, tan
. <app><lem type="emn">kasukəran</lem><rdg wit="#A">kasukərnan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>ran·</rdg></app> deneṅ sukər, ya
1360 <app><lem wit="#A">tuməpi</lem><rdg wit="#B">təmən</rdg></app> ri andabvana, svarga patala, tan
. <app><lem wit="#B">kapətəṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="lexical">katiṅalan</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">deniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">deneṁ</rdg></app> vəṅi, ya ta sinaṅguh boṅboṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B">bontos</lem><rdg wit="#A">botos</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">buṅbaṅ ləpas</lem><rdg wit="#B">buṁbaṁ <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>,
1365 <app><lem type="emn">nu təpət</lem></app>, nu
. <app><lem rend="check">rasti</lem></app> siṅ sakaharəpnya,
. <app><lem wit="#A">luṅa</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>han· təka</rdg></app> tan kinavruhan,
. <app><lem wit="#A">apa ṅaranya</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">apa ya, ṅa,</rdg></app> maṅkana.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_37.02">aum,
1370 <app><lem wit="#A">aṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="morphological">Inaṁṅən:aṅən·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">pvaṅkulun</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="orthographical">pyakulun·</rdg></app></p>
.<p xml:id="smg_37.03">ya tekaṅ saṅ hyaṅ ajñana,
. <app><lem type="emn">liṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">laṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">ṅa</rdg></app> <app><lem type="lost_elsewhere">saṅ pandita, ya ta patuṅgalan tiga təpət,
. <app><lem type="norm">tinimpalakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">tinipal·lakən·</rdg></app>
1375 <app><lem type="emn">rasmi</lem><rdg wit="#A">rəsəma</rdg><note>My emendation is based on the occurrence of <foreign>tinimpalakən rasmi</foreign> in SHH 5.12: <foreign>hilaṅa ikaṅ bāyu śabda hədap sakeṅ śārīranya məne, ndatan mulya pih asiṅ ṅvaṅ magaməl, tinimpalakən raśmi, pinarəbutakən deniṅ gagak mvaṅ asu iku.</foreign></note></app> ya ta vaṅkəy ṅaranya, ya ta mataṅyan vvitniṅ muliya təmən, saṅ hyaṅ ajñana visesa</lem><note type="altLem">saṅ pandita...ajñana visesa</note><witDetail wit="#A" type="retained"/><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="lost"/></rdg></app><pb edRef="#A" n="27r"/>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_37.04"><app><lem type="norm">ndya</lem><rdg wit="#A">nədyi</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><unclear>nən·syi</unclear></rdg></app> lvirnya sinaṅguh
. <app><lem wit="#A">muliya</lem><rdg wit="#B">mulyinyi</rdg></app> təmən, nihan
. <app><lem wit="#A">upadiyanta</lem><rdg wit="#B">Upadyita</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> kady aṅganiṅ kadaton
. <app><lem wit="#A">mesi</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="syntactic">umasiṁ ta ya</rdg></app> mas manik
1380 <app><lem wit="#A">dodot</lem><rdg wit="#B">d<unclear>yad</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> muliya raja yogya, tuhu muliya ika kabeh, nihan ri hana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> bayu
. <app><lem wit="#A">sabda</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>bda</rdg></app> hdəp,
. <app><lem wit="#B">ri hana</lem><rdg wit="#A">nihan</rdg></app> ajñana visesa ri
. <app><lem wit="#A">sariranta</lem><rdg wit="#B">saran·ta</rdg></app>.</p>
1385<p xml:id="smg_37.05">aum, tan hana vaneh saṅ hyaṅ ajñanani momah, mabayu, masabda, mahədap, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hyi<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> ajñana visesa,
. <app><lem type="emn">kaliṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalaṁṅanya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">rahaseyakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">rahasye</rdg></app> de ranak saṅ pandita.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_37.06">aum, bagya ta maṅkana.</p>
1390 </div>
.
. <!--CB.172.I.26.15a.jpg
.BAGIAN 38-->
.<!--<pb n="15r"/>
1395<lb n="15r1"/><gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>bda hapda, ri hana ñana visesa, ri saran·ta Ana tan· hana vaneḥ, saṁ hyi Añana riṁ saṁ mahabayu, saṁ mañabda, saṁ maṅhapda, saṁ hyi<gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>
.<lb n="15r2"/><gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>ru Ø nihan sabda mami, Anan·ta prəña Ana bayu sabda hdap, riṅ kita, anaku, aum. hana pvakulun katvan. ya ikaṅ yu <gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>
.<lb n="15r3"/><gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>karasa, kaprəsa, hana riṅ bvana, lavan. sarira, pvaṅkulun. tuhu yan. mahkana, hana sabda ta, hana pvakulun. <gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>
.<lb n="15r4"/><gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>siṅ kaṛṅə hana riṅ bvana, lavan. sarira, pvaṅkulun. hdap, ana riṅ kita, <gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>pvaṅkulu <gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>
. -->
1400<div type="chapter" n="38" xml:id="smg_38">
.<head type="editorial">Breath, Speech, and Mind (<foreign>bayu sabda hidəp</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_38.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">nihan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>nihan</rdg></app> sabda mami ananta <app><lem type="norm">prajña</lem><rdg wit="#A">priñu</rdg><rdg wit="#B">prəña</rdg></app>, hana bayu sabda hidəp
. <app><lem wit="#B">riṅ kita</lem><rdg wit="#A">ri kata</rdg></app> anaku.</p>
1405<p xml:id="smg_38.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">aum, hana pvaṅkulun.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">katon ya</lem><rdg wit="#B">katvan <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> denta.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.04" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">taham pvaṅkulun, <app><lem type="conj">yukti ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">yataki</rdg></app> suməṅguh hana,
. <app><lem type="emn">asiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Asəṁ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>siṁ</rdg></app> karasa
. <app><lem wit="#B">kaprəsa</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaprə</rdg></app>,
1410 <app><lem wit="#B">hana riṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">ka</rdg></app> bvana lavan sarira pvaṅkulun.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.05" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">tuhu ika yan maṅkana, hana sabda ta.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">hana
. <app><lem wit="#A">pvaṅkulun</lem><rdg wit="#B">pvakulun<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.07" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">tuhu ika yan maṅkana, katon ya ika sab<pb edRef="#A" n="27v"/>da denta.</p>
1415<p xml:id="smg_38.08" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">taham tan katon, pvaṅkulun, <app><lem type="emn">yukti ta</lem><rdg wit="#A">ya ta</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">suməṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">suməguḥ</rdg></app> hana,
. <app><lem type="emn">asiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sa</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>siṁ</rdg></app> karəṅə, hana
. <app><lem wit="#B">riṅ bvana lavan sarira</lem><rdg wit="#A">bvana sarira</rdg></app>, pvaṅkulun.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.09" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">hədap hana ta ri
1420 <app><lem wit="#A #B">kita</lem><rdg wit="#B">kita<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</p>
. <!--CB.181.I.26.24a.jpg-->
.
.<p xml:id="smg_38.10" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">hana pvaṅkulun.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_38.11" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">katon ya denta.</p>
1425<p xml:id="smg_38.12" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem type="emn">taham</lem><rdg wit="#A">tahan</rdg></app> tan katon ika pvaṅkulun,
. <app><lem type="emn">yukti</lem><rdg wit="#A">yakti</rdg></app> ta
. <app><lem type="norm">suməṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">suməguḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>gu</rdg></app> hana,
. <app><lem type="conj">sakaaṅən-aṅən</lem><rdg wit="#A">si karəṅə, Aṅən-aṅən</rdg><rdg wit="#B" cause="dittography">siṁ maAṅən:aṅən· paṁṅaṅən aṅən·</rdg></app> madvah maparək hana riṅ bvana lavan
. <app><lem wit="#A">sarira</lem><rdg wit="#B">sarira pyakulun·<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>.</p>
1430<p xml:id="smg_38.13" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">tuhu kita
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vrə</rdg></app> yan maṅkana, ya ta mataṅyan sinaṅguh saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> suksəma,
. <app><lem wit="#A">prətyaksa, laṅgəṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>laṁgəṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">hana riṅ sarira</lem><rdg wit="#A">hana sarira</rdg></app>, lavan ikaṅ rat tan hana vaneh.</p>
1435<p xml:id="smg_38.14" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ini <app><lem type="emn">vrəti</lem><rdg wit="#A">vradi</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vrədiniṁ</rdg></app> bayu sabda hədap,
. <app><lem wit="#A">seṅniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">təlu əsina <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> bayu sabda hədap, 3,
. <app><lem type="conj">katuduhaniṅ bayu sabda hədap</lem><rdg wit="#A">katuduhaniṅ bayu</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/> katuduhaniṅ hapda</rdg><note>My conjecture is based on SHH Chapter 8–14, which contain the demonstration (<foreign>katuduhan</foreign>) of the bāyu, śabda, and hədap.</note></app>, 6, ini
. <app><lem wit="#B">pañca-bayu</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>, pañca-<app><lem wit="#A" rend="hyphenleft">bvat-aji</lem><rdg wit="#B">potaji</rdg></app>, 5, pañca-<app><lem wit="#A" rend="hyphenleft">indriya</lem><rdg wit="#B">Idriya</rdg></app>, 5, varah de
. <app><lem type="emn">hinilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hvilaṅ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">hahili</rdg><note>My emendation is based on SHH 11.9.</note></app>, 3, paramarta, 4, <app><lem wit="#A">paramakevalya</lem><rdg wit="#B">parama<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, 4, asta-guna, 8, vuku añana, 3, <sic>kisiñan</sic>, 8,
1440 <app><lem type="emn">anendriya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Anen·Idraya</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>driya</rdg></app>, 3, ganal alit, 4, samaṅkana
. <app><lem wit="#A">vukuaniṅ ajñana kvehnya</lem><rdg wit="#B" cause="lexical">vukunyi</rdg></app><pb edRef="#A" n="28r"/>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">kayatnakəna</lem><rdg wit="#A">kayatnakən</rdg></app> saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="39" xml:id="smg_39">
1445<head type="editorial">Possession (<foreign>drəbya</foreign>)</head>
.
.
. <p xml:id="smg_39.01">ini tambəh ṅaranya, 2, kavikun,
. <app><lem wit="#A">4, paṅaran</lem><rdg wit="#B">4, <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, paṅaku, daṅ acarya, nihan kayatna-<app><lem type="emn">yatnakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">yatnaka</rdg></app> saṅ mamet hayu, saṅ hyaṅ ajñana, mana drəbya saṅ
1450 <app><lem type="emn">madrəbya</lem><rdg wit="#A">madribya</rdg></app>, mana tan
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakadrəbya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkadrabya</rdg></app>, kady aṅganiṅ boga, pariboga, rupaboga,
. <app><lem type="conj">ndya ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Anendra ya</rdg></app> sinaṅguh boga,
. <app><lem type="conj">pariboga</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> rupaboga.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_39.02">nihan<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sinaṅguh boga ma paṅan inum, pariboga ma hulun kuri, kəbo sapi siṅ mavnaṅ-vnaṅ, rupaboga ma, mas manik dodot malit raja yogya, ya
1455 <app><lem type="emn">busana</lem><rdg wit="#A">bvasana</rdg></app> saṅ devaratu, drabya ma, ajñana visesa, <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka</rdg></app>hayu,
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka</rdg></app>busana vastu
. <app><lem type="emn">si</lem><rdg wit="#A">siṁ</rdg></app> vvaṅ.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_39.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">rambəh ranak saṅ pandita, tətəsakən iṅ varahən, irikaṅ sinaṅguh vastu
. <app><lem type="emn">si</lem><rdg wit="#A">siṅ</rdg></app> vvaṅ ṅaranya.</p>
1460<p xml:id="smg_39.04">aum, nihan mavarah ri kita, vastu
. <app><lem type="emn">si</lem><rdg wit="#A">siṅ</rdg></app> vvaṅ ma ṅaranna, ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sa</rdg></app> sat-hana, tan hinanakən, ya ta puhunya, ya ta vvit saṅkan paran ṅaranna, ya ta vvit jati<pb edRef="#A" n="28v"/> suda ṅaranna, ya puhun ambu lavan ayah ṅaranya, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">sina</rdg></app> rahasya, ya ta darma mahavisesa, ṅa,
. <app><lem type="reformulated_elsewhere">nu maṅhanakən sarvva
1465 <app><lem type="emn">karya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kraya</rdg></app> rikaṅ loka</lem><note type="altLem">nu maṅhanakən...rikaṅ loka</note><witDetail wit="#A" type="retained"/><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>met· hayu, saṅ hya a<gap reason="lost" unit="character" quantity="6"/>ma drəbya ma</rdg></app>, ya
. <app><lem wit="#A">ta maṅgavay</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan· pinaka</rdg></app> tan ilu ginavay, ya ta mataṅyan <quote xml:id="smg_39.04.01"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">na
. <app><lem type="norm">śāstrataḥ na gurutaḥ svataḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sasṭātaḥ na gurutaḥ svataḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B"> satra gurutram satra<lacunaStart/></rdg></app></term></quote> ikaṅ sy anu ṅaranya.
. </p>
.
1470 <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_17.10"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_17.10">SHH 17.10</ref>: <foreign>təka vəkasniṅ sinaṅguh dharmvattama mahaviśeṣa, apan vənaṅ sarva karya rikaṅ loka, magavay tar ginavay, ya ta mataṅyan na śāstrataḥ na gurutaḥ svataḥ ikaṅ sy anu, ṅaranya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1475
.<p xml:id="smg_39.05">ka, <app><lem type="emn"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">na śāstrataḥ</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">na saṭā</rdg></app>, tan katəmu deniṅ sastra lavan praña, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">na gurutaḥ</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>na gurutraḥ</rdg></app></term> ma <app><lem wit="#B">kaləmpaṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaImariṅun</rdg></app> nu disiar ta ja kasurupan
. <app><lem wit="#B">kalaṅgkahan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalaṁ<add place="below">gaḥ</add>han·</rdg></app>, tan kavənaṅ
. <app><lem wit="#B">inucapakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">Inup:akən·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#A">tan</lem><rdg wit="#B">ta<lacunaStart/></rdg></app> kavənaṅ pinitəṅənakən ri saṅ guru, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">sāratasvataḥ</term> juga, hana tan hinanakən, <quote xml:id="smg_39.05.01"><term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">na bhāryā, na putraḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">na barya, na puṭaḥ</rdg></app> na
1480 <app><lem type="norm">bandhūbiḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">badubiḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">na vadubiḥ</rdg></app>, na <app><lem type="emn">mātā</lem><rdg wit="#A">mataḥ</rdg><rdg wit="#B">matra</rdg></app>, na pitam svataḥ</term></quote>, ka, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">na bhāryā</term>, tan parabi, <term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem wit="#A">na putraḥ</lem><rdg wit="#B">na matra</rdg></app></term>, tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">paanak tan</lem><rdg wit="#B">tan panak tana<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">paputu</lem><rdg wit="#A">patpu</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj"><term xml:lang="san-Latn">na mātā, na pitam svatah</term></lem><rdg wit="#A">na mataḥ, nataḥ na pitəm· svataḥ</rdg></app>, tan pabapa, tan paibu.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
1485 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_17.10"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_17.10">SHH 17.10</ref>: <foreign>na śāstrataḥ tar kəneṅ inajyan, tar katəmu deniṅ śāstra, na gurutaḥ luput tinakvanakən, tar kəna pinitəṅən deniṅ guru, kaliṅanya, sāratasvataḥ juga hana tar hinanakən, ṅaranya, na bhāryā, na putraḥ na bandhūbiḥ sira ta sinaṅguh dharma tuṅgal makavak ikaṅ bhuvana lavan sarva janma, na putraḥ tar panak tar paputu, na bhāryā tar parabi, na mātā na pitam svataḥ, sira ta svatah tar pabapa tar pebu, tar pasaṅka tar paparan, avis mrati drəsti</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.
1490<p xml:id="smg_39.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn"><app><lem type="conj">avismṛtidṛṣṭi</lem><rdg wit="#A">avis mrətis</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>tis·</rdg></app>, sira ta manon tan katon,
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vrə</rdg><rdg wit="#B">vrati</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem type="emn">kinavruhan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kinavrəḥhan·</rdg></app>, masarira tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">sinariraa<pb edRef="#A" n="29r"/>n</lem><rdg wit="#B">sinira</rdg></app>, mabayu tan
. <app><lem wit="#A">binayuan, masabda</lem><rdg wit="#B">binayon <lacunaStart/></rdg></app> tan sinabda, mahədap tan
1495 <app><lem type="emn">pinihədap</lem><rdg wit="#A">tinihdap·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">pargata juti</lem><rdg wit="#A">paR̥gata juta</rdg></app> mətu lavan sariranya, bayu sabda hədapnya, ri
. <app><lem type="emn">garbavasa</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəbavas:asa</rdg></app>, ri
. <app><lem type="emn">vrətanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">vratinya</rdg></app>, savətunya, ri heṅ, inaranan ta ya si anu.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
1500 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_17.11"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_17.11">SHH 17.11</ref>: <foreign>sira ta manon tar katon, vəruh tar kinavəruhan, pramāṇa tar kapramāṇan, manuduh tar katuduh, maśarīra tar śinarīran, mabāyu tar bināyvan, maśabda tar śinabdan, mahədap tar hinədapan, parəṅ gata juga mətu lavan śarīranya, bāyu śabda hədapnya, ar sakeṅ garbhavāsa ṅuni, ndah tapvan pakaṅaranya sakeṅ daləm vətəṅ, savətunta ri heṅ ata ya, inaranan deniṅ bapa ibu sy anu</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_39.07" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ya ta mataṅyan saṅ hyaṅ mevəh ṅaranya, si anu vaneh, antian ta puṅguṅnika loka, lavan saṅ rat, tan vruh ri bapa ibunikaṅ sabvana, lavan anaknikaṅ loka, syapa ta sira vihikan, saṅ pandita juga tan hana vaneh.
1505 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_17.12"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_17.02">SHH 17.12</ref>: <foreign>ya ta mataṅyan saṅ hyaṅ mevəh ṅaranika sy anu vaneh, apan hana śarīranya sinaṅgah sy anu, hana bāyu śabda hədapnya sinaṅgahnya sy anu, hana saṅ yvaga pasamvahanya vaknya kabeh, sinaṅgahnya sy anu, kaliṅanya pətəṅ pəpət andakara juga ṅvaṅ sabhuvana, tar vəruh i sinaṅgahnya bapa ibu lavan anak. syapa ta sira vihikan ri bapa ibunikaṅ sabhuvana, lavan anaknikaṅ loka, saṅ paṇḍita juga tar hana vaneh.</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1510<p xml:id="smg_39.08" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">aum, ranak saṅ pandita,
. <app><lem type="norm">tətəsakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">tətəssakən·na</rdg></app>, inaranan bapa ibu, ta sy anu.
.</p>
. </div>
.<div type="chapter" n="40" xml:id="smg_40">
1515<head type="editorial"><foreign>Vari</foreign> Flowers (<foreign>vuṅa vari</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_40.01">aum, nihan mami asih ri kita, 5, ini vuṅavari, artanya nihan, vuṅavari ma kapas, varna ma ṅaranna
. <app><lem type="norm">kanteh</lem><rdg wit="#A">kateḥ</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem rend="check">vri</lem></app> ma ṅaranna boeh.</p>
1520<p xml:id="smg_40.02">ka, nu kaṅkən vuṅavari ma sarira, nu kaṅkən
. <app><lem type="norm">kanteh</lem><rdg wit="#A">kateḥ</rdg></app> ta ma, na hədap, nu kaṅkən boeh ta ma, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_40.03">ka, makapanon <pb edRef="#A" n="29v"/>hədapnya, makadvara matanya kalih, makahurip bayunya,
. <app><lem type="norm" rend="hyphenright">maka</lem><rdg wit="#A">maṁka-</rdg></app>pavastu sabdanya, makapaṅastana sariranya,
1525 <app><lem type="norm">makadora</lem><rdg wit="#A">makaAdora</rdg></app> ikaṅ bvana.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_40.04">nu baṅ ta ma varna,
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥni</rdg></app> tinonya ṅaranna, dvara
. <app><lem type="norm">manonton</lem><rdg wit="#A">manvatvan·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">kəmbaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kəbaṁ</rdg></app> vuṅavari ika, mata
1530 <app><lem type="emn">golaka kalih viji</lem><rdg wit="#A">mata gvalak<add place="below">livi</add>ja</rdg><note>Cf.SP 14a <foreign xml:lang="kaw-Latn">pira ta pikolihniṅ mata golaka kalih viji, sanvajədyana ika pət taṅ rasa luputnya sakeṅ śarīra</foreign>.</note></app>, panonton
. <app><lem type="emn">kəmbaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kəbaṁ</rdg></app> vuṅavari ika, cipta,
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥ</rdg></app> ri panonya ṅaranika, syapa ta ya saṅ tumon
. <app><lem type="norm">kəmbaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kəbaṁ</rdg></app> vuṅavari.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_40.05">ranak denta
1535 <app><lem type="norm">saṅhulun</lem><rdg wit="#A">saṁṅulun</rdg></app>.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_40.06">kavikan, 3, katəpət, 1, panatabna, 3, mokta jiva, 9, acintya, ṅa, icaluṅ, i, mamikul, ba, kayu magəṅ.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_40.07">ini pañca-mahabuta, 5, pañca-<app><lem type="emn">gati</lem><rdg wit="#A">ganti</rdg></app>, 5, pañca-<app><lem type="emn">marga</lem><rdg wit="#A">mraga</rdg></app>, 5, samaṅkana
. <app><lem type="emn">kayatnakna</lem><rdg wit="#A">kayatnaknə</rdg></app> saṅ sevaka darma.</p>
. </div>
1540<div type="chapter" n="41" xml:id="smg_41">
.<head type="editorial">Five Sections (<foreign>vuku lima</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_41.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan sandi<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem type="norm">təmbəy</lem><rdg wit="#A">təbəy·</rdg></app> saṅ pandita maṅucap vuku<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> sandi ṅaranya, si tutur<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ya pinakasipat ikaṅ bvana, lavan ikaṅ sarva janma, ya ta mataṅyan tan salah tuvuh tan salah<pb edRef="#A" n="30r"/> rasa ikaṅ rat kabeh, abənər tumiru bapa ibunya, mvaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">vvitan</lem><rdg wit="#A">vvattan·</rdg></app>
1545 <app><lem type="emn">sabvatnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabvanya</rdg></app> ikaṅ sarvva janma kabeh, vvaṅ manak vvaṅ, satva manak satva, 1.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_21.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_21.01">SHH 21.1</ref>: <foreign>nyaṅ sandhi təmbəyniṅ saṅ paṇḍita maṅucap vuku, sandhi ṅaranya si tutur, ya pinakasipatnikaṅ bhuvana lavan sarva janma, mataṅyan tar salah tuvuh, tar salah rūpa, tar salah rasa ikaṅ rat kabeh, abənər tumiru bapa ibunyan mvaṅ vit bvatnya ikaṅ sarva janma, vvaṅ manak vvaṅ, kəbo manak kəbo, sapi manak sapi, sarva tumuvuh tar salah tuvuh pada kalaya-layanya, makasəvə-səvənya, tar salah vvah tar salah rasa, vruh juga ya kabeh ri jātinya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1550 </listApp>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_41.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan sinaṅguh tapa ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="conj">apa pinakarasanya, si lilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>pinakarasanya si lilaṁ</rdg><note>This conjecture is based on the parallel passage on <ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_51.01">SHH 51.1</ref>.</note></app>, aparan mataṅyan si
. <app><lem wit="#B">lilaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">lila</rdg></app>, ṅa, nihan
1555 <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvarnya</rdg><rdg wit="#B">lyirnyi</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">iniṅətnira</lem><rdg wit="#A">niṅət·nira</rdg><rdg wit="#B">Eṅət·nira</rdg></app> makadrabya bvana
. <app><lem wit="#A">lavan sarira</lem><rdg wit="#B">lavan· <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, 7.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
1560 <note corresp="txt:SHH_22.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_22.01">SHH 22.1</ref>: <foreign>maṅkana tekiṅ tapa, apa pinakarasanya, si liṅlaṅ, apa mataṅyan aliṅlaṅ, ri eṅətnira pakadrabya bhuvana lavan śarīra, ṅuniveh bāyu śabda hədap, an aṅhiṅ sira saviji pramāṇa tan hana vaneh, ya ta mataṅyan tar karakətan sarva mala, hyun lulut ilik tṛṣṇā tan hana ri saṅ meṅət, aləṅis juga manahnira; si nistṛṣṇā, tan asih, tan ahyun, tan akuṅ, tan onaṅ, tan harsa, tan aharəp, tan adṛḍha, tan raga, tan alah-alah, varəg vruh sih jiva bhāṣa humus juga, ya byakta nirmala lilaṅ ṅaranya, tan kapramāṇan deniṅ śarīranya, ṅuniveh bāyu śabda hədapnira, nahan pinakaviśeṣanikaṅ saṅ manon, yar tapa</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_41.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">maṅkana tekaṅ luṅguh,
1565 <app><lem type="emn">apa pinakarasanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apinaḥkarasanya</rdg></app>, si pagəh, tuhu kari saṅ manon
. <app><lem wit="#A">mapagəh ri</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>kan· ri</rdg></app>
. <app><lem wit="#B">paṅavruhanira ri</lem><rdg wit="#A">vra, nira</rdg></app> sakala niskala, apa
. <app><lem wit="#A">kapagəhanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">kapaṁguhan·nikaṁ</rdg></app> saṅ manon ri sakala, tan ilu
. <app><lem wit="#A">misesaakən</lem><rdg wit="#B">mise<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, aji mantra huṅkara padkara, ṅuniveh gəlar puja, jampa jampya,
1570 <app><lem wit="#A">tan ilu</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>lu</rdg></app> ata kita misesaakəna
. <app><lem type="emn">rika</lem><rdg wit="#A">nika</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">deniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">deni</rdg></app> tapa brata, yoga samadi, tan kavacica deniṅ guna kabeh,
. <app><lem wit="#A">nihan kapagəhan</lem><rdg wit="#B"><unclear>nihana</unclear><lacunaStart/></rdg></app> saṅ manon ri sakala, ndya kapagəhanikaṅ saṅ manon ri niskala,
. <app><lem wit="#A">hayva sira</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>yyan· ta kita</rdg></app>
1575 <app><lem type="norm">mahavvilan</lem><rdg wit="#A">mahavvaIlan</rdg></app>.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_23.01–23.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_23.01">SHH 23.1–2</ref>: <foreign>maṅkana tekaṅ luṅguh, apa pinakarasanya si pagəh tuhva tekeṅ saṅ manon mapagəha ri vruhnira ri sakala niskala, apa pagəhanika saṅ manon ri sakala, tar ilva misesakən aji mantra huṅkara, gəlar pūjā dhyāna samādhi, tar ilva miśeṣakən tapa brata, tar ilva miśeṣakən guṇa-guni, nahan kapagəhnika saṅ manon ri sakala. ndya kapagəhan ika saṅ manon ri niskala, hayva sira mahavvilan</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1580 </listApp>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_41.04">maṅkana tekaṅ pratyaksa, apa

. <app><lem wit="#A">sy asəmbava</lem><rdg wit="#B">syi səm·ba<lacunaStart/></rdg></app>, apa ta kaliṅanya ikaṅ sinaṅguh səmbava, ṅa, nihan <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem></app>,
1585 <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vra</rdg></app> karika
. <app><lem type="emn">tuṅgalanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">katugal·kanyi</rdg></app> <app><lem type="emn">asəmbavanikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">səmbavanikaṅ</rdg></app> rat kabeh
. <app><lem wit="#A">pinakabvananya</lem><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>pinakaIvənya</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem wit="#B">taham</lem><rdg wit="#A">tahan·</rdg></app> tan
. <app><lem wit="#B">vruha</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥha</rdg></app>
1590 <app><lem wit="#B">karika</lem><rdg wit="#A">kari</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">manon</lem><rdg wit="#A">manivan·</rdg><rdg wit="#B">mavəḥ</rdg></app>, ikaṅ sarira pinakasariranya, taham
. <app><lem wit="#B">vruha</lem></app>
. <app><lem wit="#A">karika saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#B">karika <lacunaStart/></rdg></app>

. <app><lem type="norm">pinaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥka</rdg></app>varnanya,
1600 <app><lem type="emn">taham</lem><rdg wit="#A">tahan·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">karika</lem><rdg wit="#A">tarika</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ pramana</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya pramana</rdg><rdg wit="#B"><lacunaEnd/>prəmana</rdg></app>, irikaṅ bayu sabda hədap, irikaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">pinakahuripnya</lem><rdg wit="#A"/></app>, taham
1605 <app><lem type="omitted_elsewhere"><app><lem type="emn">vruha</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥ</rdg></app> karika saṅ hyaṅ visesa, irikaṅ sabda
. <app><lem type="emn">pinakapaṅvastunya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkapaṁvastanya</rdg></app>, taham
. <app><lem type="emn">vruha</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥha</rdg></app> karika saṅ hyaṅ rahasya, irikaṅ cita, pinakapaṅaṅən-aṅən</lem><witDetail type="retained" wit="#A"/><note type="altLem">vruha...pinakapaṅaṅən-aṅən</note><rdg wit="#B"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="conj">ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">taham ya</rdg></app> ta
. <app><lem type="emn">asəmbava</lem><rdg wit="#A">səmbava</rdg></app> ṅaranya, 7.
1610</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_24.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_24.01">SHH 24.1</ref>: <foreign>maṅkana tekaṅ pratyakṣa, apa pinakarasanya, sy asəmbhava, apa kaliṅanya, vruh karikaṅ tuṅgal ry asambhavanikaṅ bhuvana kahananya, taham vruh karikaṅ tuṅgal ri asambhavanikaṅ śarīra pinakāvaknya taham, vruh karikaṅ tuṅgal ri asambhavanikaṅ bāyu śabda hədap pinakahuripnya mvaṅ pinakasādhananya, taha tar vruh kary asambhavanika kabeh, kadi pituhunya ikaṅ aji mantra sajñāti gəlar pūjā, mvaṅ phalaniṅ tapa brata həlam yan mati, yan apa ika, yan vruha ya ry asambhavanika kabeh</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1615 </listApp>

.<, ///Ø nən·dyi saṁ mi<gap reason="illegible" unit="character" quantity="4"></gap>m·<gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>

1620<lb n="26r4"/><gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>savesṭā sakajar mahacin·tyi, ṅa, saṁ manon· ya ta sinaṁgu tiga rahasya bas:a ṅa, tan· kapaṁguḥ Ikaṁ tiga sa<gap reason="lost" extent="unknown"/>-->
.<p xml:id="smg_41.05" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndya
. <app><lem>saka rika</lem></app> asəmbava, lavan pagavay asəmbava, nihan cətana ri
. <app><lem type="emn">citanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">tanya</rdg></app>, hana ya manik sarvesta,
. <app><lem type="emn">sakarja</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakrəja</rdg></app>
1625 <app><lem type="norm">paripuraka</lem></app>, manik sarvesta mahacintya saṅ manon, ya
. <app><lem type="norm">pina<pb edRef="#A" n="31r"/>kaaməṅ-aməṅan</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkaAməAməṅan·</rdg></app> saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> darma.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
1630 <note corresp="txt:SHH_24.06–24.07"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_24.06">SHH 24.6–7</ref>: <foreign>hana maṇik sarveṣṭa sakārja paripūraka ṅaranya, cinaritakən ri carita kumara mvaṅ saṅ murti mvaṅ śrīvikramāditya, ar sakārja nu vidi ikaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa ri carita, aum, rəṅo ranak devatā saṅhulun, yar kvliṅanta ri kami, umapa tekaṅ maṇik sarveṣṭa sakārja paripūraka, liṅtānaku, manik vatu kari ya liṅta. aum, maṇik vatu ata ya liṅ ranak devatā saṅhulun, taha py anaku, yadyastun petən ta ya ri vəkasnikaṅ lvar kidul kulvan vetan, i svar i ruhur, tar pamaṅguh juga kita irika</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_41.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndya sinaṅguh manik
. <app><lem type="emn">sarvesta</lem><rdg wit="#A">savesṭā</rdg></app>,
1635 <app><lem type="emn">sakarja</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakajar</rdg></app> paripuraka ṅaranya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ikaṅ hədap, apa manik
. <app><lem type="emn">sakarja</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakajar</rdg></app> nu vidi ṅaranya, ikaṅ tutur, ndya ya manik
. <app><lem type="emn">sarvesta</lem><rdg wit="#A"/></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">sakarja</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakajar</rdg></app> mahacintya ṅaranya saṅ manon, ya ta sinaṅguh tiga rahasya basa ṅaranya, tan kapaṅguh rahasya di saṅ pandita denikaṅ sevaka darma.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
1640 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_24.07"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_24.07">SHH 24.7</ref>: <foreign>aparan pva kaṅ sinaṅguh saṅ paṇḍita, sarveṣṭa sakarja paripūraka ṅaranya, ikaṅ hədap, sarveṣṭa sakārja nu vidi, ikaṅ tutur, yeka maṇik sarveṣṭa sakārja paripuraka ṅaranya, mvaṅ sakarja nu vidi ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, pinakāməṅ-aməṅan saṅ hyaṅ dharma, ya ta kinudaṅ-kudaṅnikaṅ loka riṅ yoga ṅaranya, salvirnikaṅ kiduṅ mamuhara raga, mvaṅ vijahira kaṅ loka.</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
1645<div type="chapter" n="42" xml:id="smg_42">
.<head type="editorial">Three Secrets (<foreign>tiga-rahasya</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndya sinaṅguh tiga rahasya, bayu sabda hədap, ikaṅ sinaṅguh tiga rahasya, taham tiga sadana ṅaranna, ka, apa ya sinaṅguh tiga rahasya ṅaranya, ri mahapandita.</p>
. <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
1650 <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.02">SHH 25.2</ref>: <foreign>ndya pvekaṅ tiga saṅkanya takarih, hana tiga rahasya ṅaranya, vəkasniṅ tiga vinuvus saṅ paṇḍita, ikaṅ bāyu śabda hədap kari ya, taha tiga sādhana ṅaranika</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">aum, nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">lvarnya</rdg></app>, nya hədap, nya tutur, nya saṅ manon, yeka
1655 <app><lem type="emn">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">vvətniṁ</rdg></app> səmbava ṅaranya, apa byaktanya, ika
. <app><lem type="emn">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">vvatniṁ</rdg></app> səmbava pvaṅkulun, nihan
. <app><lem type="emn">dr̥stanta</lem></app> iriya, kady aṅganiṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">pañjut</lem><rdg wit="#A">pajut</rdg></app>, dilah lavan teja.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">
1660 <app><lem type="norm">tuṅgal</lem><rdg wit="#A">tugal</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">karika</lem><rdg wit="#A">kanika</rdg></app> pvaṅkulun, ikaṅ dilah lavan teja.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.04">taham pih tan hana maṅkana<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> dudu dilah dudu teja dudu apuy atasih<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> saṅka ri a<pb edRef="#A" n="31v"/>puy ikaṅ dilah lavan teja, riṅ apuy paranya<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied>
. <app><lem type="norm">pəjah</lem><rdg wit="#A">pjəḥ</rdg></app> muliha riṅ saṅkanya, pəjah jatinya.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
1665 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.03"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.03">SHH 25.3</ref>: <foreign>ndya pvekaṅ tiga rahasya ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita nihan, nyaṅ hədap, nyaṅ tutur, nyaṅ saṅ manon, yeka tiga rahasya ṅaranya, saṅkanikaṅ bhuvana lavan sarva janma, nihan dṛṣṭanta irikaṅ tiga rahasya, ar ya saṅkanikaṅ bhuvana lavan sarva janma, nyaṅ pañjut, dilahnya, mvaṅ tejanya, tuṅgal karika liṅta, taham pih, duduṅ dilah, duduṅ teja, duduṅ apuy</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.05" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">apa byaktanya, pasaṅ ikaṅ pañjut muvah, bar ta ya
1670 <app><lem type="emn">murub</lem><rdg wit="#A">murug·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">aṅadəg</lem><rdg wit="#A">Aṅajəg·</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">parəṅ gata</lem><rdg wit="#A">paR̥ga</rdg></app> jatinika,
. <app><lem type="emn">bijilnikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">mjəl·niṁkaṁ</rdg></app> dilah, bijilnikaṅ teja,
. <app><lem type="norm">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#A">makana</rdg></app> ta ya
1675 <app><lem type="emn">pəjah</lem><rdg wit="#A">gəjaḥ</rdg></app> <!-- Sepertinya ada GAP BESAR dalam SMG--> , hələnikaṅ dilah lavan teja,
. <app><lem type="emn">parəṅ gata</lem><rdg wit="#A">paR̥tga</rdg></app> hələ, maṅkana hdip lavan tutur, ṅuniveh saṅ manon.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.06"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.06">SHH 25.6</ref>: <foreign>apa byaktanya, pasaṅ muvah ikaṅ pañjut, bar parəṅ gata jātinika, mijilniṅ dilah mijilniṅ teja, maṅkana ta ya pəjah, hilaṅniṅ teja, parəṅ gata ata ya hilaṅ</foreign>.</note>
1680 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">apa ta sinaṅguh apuy ṅaranya, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana,
. <app><lem type="emn">apa pinakadilah</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apinaḥkadilaḥ</rdg></app>, ika cita, apa
1685 <app><lem type="emn">pinakapanasnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinakapanonya</rdg></app> mvaṅ tejanya, ikaṅ sandi, ka, na hədap tutur saṅ manon, ya ta sinaṅguh
. <app><lem type="emn">vvitniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">vvəm tniṁ</rdg></app> səmbava ṅaranya, 3.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.07"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.07">SHH 25.7</ref>: <foreign>apa sinaṅguh apuy ṅaranya, saṅ manon, apa pinakadilahnya, ikaṅ hədap, apa pinakapanasnya mvaṅ pinakatejanya, ikaṅ tutur, ndah saṅ manon ta sinaṅguh apuy ṅaranya, nahan sinaṅguh tiga rahasya ṅaranya, vəkasniṅ maṅucap tiga liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, ya teka saṅkanikaṅ bhuvana lavan sarva janma</foreign>.</note>
1690 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.07">ini paṅakuna, kady aṅganiṅ saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">citrakara</lem><rdg wit="#A">citakara</rdg></app>, vrati lavan panuli, kady aṅganiṅ gaṅsa lavan malam, ṅuniveh
. <app><lem type="emn">salaka</lem><rdg wit="#A">suṁsaL̥ka</rdg></app>, ka, na hədap<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> na tutur, na saṅ manon, ya ta sinaṅguh paṅaku səmbava ṅaranna.</p>
1695<p xml:id="smg_42.08">ini ka,
. <app><lem type="conj">dudu dilah, dudu teja, dudu apuy</lem><rdg wit="#A">dudu Apuy·</rdg></app>, apa ta byaktanya, pasaṅ ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">pañjut</lem><rdg wit="#A">pajut</rdg></app>, ṅa, tinonakən sumbunya, bar ta ya
. <app><lem type="emn">dumilah</lem><rdg wit="#A">dulaḥ</rdg></app> ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">aṅadəg</lem><rdg wit="#A">ṅagdə</rdg></app>
1700 <app><lem type="emn">muru<pb edRef="#A" n="32r"/>b</lem><rdg wit="#A">murug·</rdg><!-- similar --></app>, aṅadəg satuduhan gəṅnya, ya ta dilah ṅaranya, ika
. <app><lem type="emn">abraṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">abrar</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">humibək iṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">humibək·kəṁ</rdg></app> umah, teka teja ṅaranya,
. <app><lem type="conj">ikaṅ luməṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">luməṁ Ikaṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">sakunaṅ-kunaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sakusnaṁ kunaṁ</rdg></app><supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> ikaṅ abaṅ ri
1705 <app><lem type="norm">tuṅtuṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">tutuṁ</rdg></app> sumbu, ya ta apuy ṅaranya, <app><lem type="emn">nahan</lem><rdg wit="#A">nihan</rdg></app> byaktanikaṅ apuy yan dudu dilah lavan teja,
. <app><lem type="emn">riṅ ndi</lem><rdg wit="#A">mariṁṅədi</rdg></app> paranikaṅ dilah lavan teja, mari sunya taya kari ya, taham pih tan hana maṅkana.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.04"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.04">SHH 25.4</ref>: <foreign>apa byaktanya, pasaṅ ikaṅ pañjut tunon sumbunya, bar dumilah ta ya, ikaṅ murub aṅadəg satumuduhan gəṅnya, yeka dilah ṅaranya, ikaṅ abraṅ humibək iṅ umah yeka teja ṅaranya, ikaṅ luməṅ sakunaṅ-kunaṅ, abaṅ ri tutuṅniṅ sumbu, yeka apuy ṅaranya, nahan byaktanikaṅ apuy, ar duduṅ mvaṅ dilahnya lavan tejanya</foreign>.</note>
1710 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.09" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">apa ta liṅnira kabeh, mara ri sunya taya,
. <app><lem type="emn">taham pih</lem><rdg wit="#A">tampiḥ</rdg></app> tan hana maṅkana, apa liṅnira kabeh, mara ri sunya taya,
. <app><lem type="conj">dilah</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> lavan tejanya, mvaṅ apuynya, liṅ saṅ viku vaneh, taham pih liṅ saṅ pandita, hayva kita maṅkana.
1715 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.05"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.05">SHH 25.5</ref>: <foreign>apan liṅnira vaneh mara ri śūnyataya kətah paraniṅ dilahnikaṅ apuy mvaṅ tejanya, hayva ta maṅkana</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1720<p xml:id="smg_42.10" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndya paranikaṅ dilah lavan tejanya, mareṅ vastuanana, ṅa,
. <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyiganiṁ</rdg></app> hantəlu,
. <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyiganiṁ</rdg></app> viji ambavaṅ,
. <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyiganiṁ</rdg></app> kaṅ məraṅ,
. <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyaganiṁ</rdg></app> masavah-savah,
1725 <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyaganiṁ</rdg></app> buṅa lavan lavay, ṅaranya, sa, a.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_25.05"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_25.05">SHH 25.5</ref>: <foreign>ndi pva paranikaṅ dilah mvaṅ teja, mareṅ apuy ata sih, saṅka riṅ apuy ikaṅ dilah mvaṅ teja, mareṅ apuy paranyan pəjah mulih ri saṅkanya jātinika</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
1730 </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.11">ya ta sinaṅguh yoga batara ṅaranna, ini guna nu maha ta, ini bisa nu vi<pb edRef="#A" n="32v"/>sesa, aku, ṅaranna, aiṅ saṅ sat-hana, tan hinanakən, saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">svatah</lem><rdg wit="#A">svatraḥ</rdg></app> maṅgavay tan ilu ginavay,
. <app><lem type="emn">apan aku</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apala Aku</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="ac"/><rdg wit="#A">Apana Aku</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="pc"/></app> pramana tan kapramanaan, aku visesa tan kavisesaan, ya ta
. <app><lem type="emn">sinaṅguh</lem><rdg wit="#A">sənaṁguḥ</rdg></app> tiga rahasya visesa ṅaranna, 7.
1735</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.12">ini panatabna ṅaranna, bvana mari adarana, sarira mari astana, bayu mari
. <app><lem type="emn">hurip</lem><rdg wit="#A">hunap</rdg></app>, sabda mari dipipaṅvastu, hədap
. <app><lem type="emn">mari ya</lem><rdg wit="#A">manyi</rdg></app> ginavay, tutur mari pagavay, saṅ manon mari ya magavay, niruktinya liṅ arya pandita.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.13">ini pamupulna ṅaranna, hədap ta bətəṅ dijiən, tutur bətəṅ dipipañiyən, saṅ manon bətəṅ ñiyən, ya ta sinaṅguh
1740 <app><lem type="emn">pamupul</lem><rdg wit="#A">pamul·</rdg></app> ṅaranna.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.14">ini pamulasna ṅaranna, hədap ta maṅku bətəṅ dijiən ku eta, tutur maṅku na bətəṅ ñiən ku iña, saṅ manon manana maka bətəṅ ñiən ku uraṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh pamulasna, ṅa.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_42.15">ini astitina ṅaranna, tan katon ika, kahədap ginavay lavan <pb edRef="#A" n="33r"/>pagavay ṅuniveh saṅ magavay,
. apan <app><lem type="emn">suksəma</lem><rdg wit="#A">susəma</rdg></app> ikaṅ hədap, mari ya ginavay, adrasya ikaṅ tutur, mari ya ginavay,
. <app><lem type="norm">acintya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Acityi</rdg></app> saṅ manon, ya ta sinaṅguh paṅastitian ṅaranna, ikaṅ tiga rahasya ṅaranna.</p>
1745</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="43" xml:id="smg_43">
.<head type="editorial">Liberation (<foreign>kaləpasən</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_43.01"><app><lem type="norm">maṅkana</lem><rdg wit="#A">makana</rdg></app> tekaṅ kaləpasən, apa ta pinakarahasyanya magavay, ya ta sinaṅguh paṅatistian, ṅa, ikaṅ si krataka lavan si dum, kaliṅanya,
1750 <app><lem type="emn">vruhanira</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥhanira</rdg></app> pagavaynya,
. <app><lem type="emn">vruhanira</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥhanira</rdg></app> maṅduman gavaynira ri sakala niskala, ikaṅ saṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">manon</lem><rdg wit="#A">manivan</rdg><rdg wit="#A">manivan</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="pc"/><rdg wit="#A">nimavan</rdg><witDetail wit="#A" type="ac"/></app>.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
1755 <note corresp="txt:SHH_26.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_26.01">SHH 26.1</ref>: <foreign>maṅkana tekaṅ kaləpasən, apa pinakarasanya, si krataka, lavan si dum, apa krataka ṅaranya, gavay, apa dum ṅaranya, titah vatəs vija karmadhātu dumi ika kabeh, apa kaliṅanya, vruhaniran pakagavay vruhanira dumumi gavaynira ri sakala niskala, ika saṅ manon ar pagavay dinumnira hiniṅanira gavaynira</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_43.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">apa
. <app><lem type="norm">upadyanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">Upadyita</rdg></app>,
1760 <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadyaganiṁ</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="norm">pande</lem><rdg wit="#A">pade</rdg></app> mas, təka ta saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">makonkon</lem><rdg wit="#A">makvakvan·</rdg></app>, pagavayakəniṅ ulun səsəran lavan iṅət-iṅət,
. <app><lem type="emn">sumaur</lem><rdg wit="#A">sumaU</rdg></app> ta ya saṅ pande, huvus
. <app><lem type="emn">tumiṅgalakən</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">tumigaltumigallakən·</rdg></app> pagavayniṅ ulun, huvus tinarimakən, deniṅ pinakaṅulun, ri kalulanya, mari ta ya byapara deniṅ pinakaṅulun, alavas guna katiṅal deniṅ ṅulun, luṅa ta <pb edRef="#A" n="33v"/> saṅ makonkon, amet ta ya pande vaneh.
1765 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_26.16"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_26.16">SHH 26.16</ref>: <foreign>apa ta deyanika saṅ manon humiṅ ika si pati, nihan deyanira, iva kady aṅganiṅ paṇḍe mas an sumimakən, pagavaynya, tinarimakənya ri kavulanya, mari ta ya byapara irikaṅ kasulpikan, dataṅ mara pveka saṅ makonkon, apa tekānuṅ sahura, kasihana pva saṅhulun, pagavayakna simsim lavan səsəran, liṅ saṅ manon maṅkana, sumahur saṅ paṇḍe, mari kətah pinakahulun paṇḍe maṅke, pagavaynikaṅ təlas tinarimakən iṅ pinakahulun, təka yan pinakahulun, alupa ri kagavayanya, ikaṅ saginavaynya, apan alavas ikaṅ guṇa katiṅgal deniṅ pinakahulun, nahan liṅ saṅ paṇḍey, vuruṅ ta saṅ makonkon kerəṅan, luṅha yāmet paṇḍe vaneh, saṅ paṇḍey mari maṅel deniṅ gavaynya, lavan ikaṅ ginavaynya, mari ta ya hulun deniṅ gavaynya</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1770<p xml:id="smg_43.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">muvah maṅkana saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana, mari gumavay ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">citrakara</lem><rdg wit="#A">cintakara</rdg></app>, mari pagavay ikaṅ tutur saṅ manon, mari madrabya kabeh, ya ta mataṅyan kaduman, ṅa, maṅhiṅan tan kahiṅanan, ri gavaynira sakala niskala, kaliṅanya, nihan sinaṅguh kaləpasən ṅaranna liṅ saṅ pandita.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="44" xml:id="smg_44">
1775<head type="editorial">Epitome (<foreign>taṅkəs</foreign>)</head>
.
.<p xml:id="smg_44.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">maṅkana tekaṅ taṅkəs, ṅa, pet
. <app><lem type="emn">rasaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">nusaniṁ</rdg></app> tuhu, tan pabalik madoh, apa
. <app><lem type="norm">upadyanta</lem><rdg wit="#A">Upadyita</rdg></app>,
1780 <app><lem type="norm">kady aṅganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kadayaganiṁ</rdg></app> sapu hada, makveh ṅaranya, ya ta
. <app><lem rend="check">kasigənan</lem></app> deniṅ suh tuṅgal, iva maṅkana tekaṅ vuvus kabeh.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ya saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> visesa, sira magavay pinakarasanya ri
. <app><lem type="norm">pratyaksa</lem><rdg wit="#A">pratyiksa</rdg></app>, tuhu tekaṅ saṅ manon
1785 <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥ</rdg></app> irika si vuilan, pinakapapanya irikaṅ luṅguh, tuhu tekaṅ saṅ manon,
. <app><lem type="emn">vruha</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥha</rdg></app> rika si trəsna, pinakapapanya, si nirtrəsna pinakavisesanya irika tapa, tuhu ya tekaṅ saṅ manon
. <app><lem type="emn">vruha</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥha</rdg></app> ri si <pb edRef="#A" n="34r"/>lupa, pinakapapanya, si tutur pinakavisesanya, irikaṅ sandi,
. <app><lem type="conj">hayva</lem><rdg wit="#A">Iyava</rdg></app> tikaṅ saṅ manon milu irika kabeh, yavat apapa yan maṅkana, ya ta kayatna-yatna saṅ sevaka darma, liṅ maha pandita.
.</p>
1790 <listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_27.07–27.11"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_27.07">SHH 27.7–11</ref>: <foreign>si tuhu atekaṅ enak apagəh pamituhvan riya, apa kaliṅanya, tuhva taṅ saṅ manon ar sira meṅət ar sira maṅdumi tar kaduman, maṅhiṅi tar kahiṅan, ri sakala niskala pinakarasanya ri kaləpasan. tuhva ta saṅ manon meṅət ar sira magavay tan ginavay, ar gavay ikaṅ hədap, tutur pinakapagavay, mataṅyan asambhava ikaṅ rat kabeh, pinakarasanya ri pratyakṣa. tuhva tekaṅ saṅ manon meṅət i landəpniṅ rvi, bvaniṅ tahi, panasniṅ apuy, tar ambaha ya, vvilan ta ṅaranika, pinakarasanya ri luṅguh. tuhva tekaṅ saṅ manon meṅət ar pinakapāpa ikeṅ si tṛṣṇā ri sakala niskala, ya ta sinaṅguh nis tṛṣṇā pinakaviśeṣanya, pinakarasanya ri tapa. tuhva tekaṅ saṅ manon meṅət ar si lupa biparita pinakapāpanya ri sakala niskala rikaṅ sandhi, si tutur pinakaviśeṣanya rikaṅ sandhi</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1795<p xml:id="smg_44.03" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan <app><lem type="norm">təmbəyniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">təbəyniṁ</rdg></app> tulis ṅaranya, apa tinuduhnya denira saṅ pandita ri
. <app><lem type="norm">təmbəyniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">təbəyniṁ</rdg></app> tulis, nirsaṅsaya
. <app><lem type="emn">juga</lem><rdg wit="#A">duga</rdg></app> huvus,
. <app><lem type="emn">apa pinakarasanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Apinaḥkarasanya</rdg></app>, nihan ototniṅ taṅan
. <app><lem type="conj">kanan</lem><rdg wit="#A"><gap reason="omitted"/></rdg></app> keri, tulis
1800 <app><lem type="emn">muṅgviṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">maṁgvaṁ</rdg></app> kaləpa-ləpaniṅ taṅan, iya ta ləṅən, ṅa, tan hana
. <app><lem type="emn">kakuraṅanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kakaraṅanya</rdg></app>, tan hana luputi saṅka ri taṅan gavay.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_28.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_28.01">SHH 28.1</ref>: <foreign>nihan təmbəyniṅ tulis ṅaranya, apa tinuduh saṅ paṇḍita ri təmbəyniṅ tulis, nihan otvatniṅ taṅan kanan keri, tulis alit muṅgviṅ ləpa-ləpaniṅ taṅanta, ndah seṅ ika, apa siniṇḍənika, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kratya kṛtaka</term>, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kṛtaka</term> ṅaranya gavay, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">kratya</term> ṅaranya taṅan, apa kaliṅanya, tar hana gavay luput ri taṅan, ya ta mataṅyan tinuduh ikaṅ otvat tulisniṅ taṅanta, apan pinakasvaṅ pinakatattvani gavay saṅ manon ri niskala ika, marahakən ya saṅ magavay ri sakala niskala kaliṅanika</foreign>.</note>
1805 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.04" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan <app><lem type="norm">kapiṅdvaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapidvaniṁ</rdg></app> tulis, ṅa,
. <app><lem type="emn">lvirnya</lem><rdg wit="#A">Alvarnyi</rdg></app> nihan<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> byaktanya sabda saṅkiriman, ya pinakaseṅ saṅ pandita, apa tinuduhnya, nihan gola
. <app><lem type="emn">kalih</lem><rdg wit="#A">kali</rdg></app> viji, ka, lakuniṅ hurip lakuniṅ vuvus, ka, lakuniṅ budi lakuniṅ vruh, lakuniṅ sandi lakuniṅ cita, maṅkana ta saṅ
1810 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana, lavan saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> visesa, tuṅgal <pb edRef="#A" n="34v"/>lavan rahaseya, yugapat
. <app><lem type="emn">parəṅ gata</lem><rdg wit="#A">parəga</rdg></app> jatinya, tan vikanyaniṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">kaləpasan</lem><rdg wit="#A">kaL̥pa</rdg></app> juga huvus,
. <app><lem type="emn">pinakarasanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkaranya</rdg></app>
1815 <app><lem type="norm">kapiṅdvaniṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapidvaniṁ</rdg></app> tulis, liṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">saṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">sa</rdg></app> utama pandita, kayatna-yatna saṅ sevaka darma, 2.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_29.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_29.01">SHH 29.1</ref>: <foreign>nihan kapindoniṅ tulis, śabda saṅkiriman, ya pinakaseṅ saṅ paṇḍita, apa tinuduhnira, nyaṅ gvala kalih viji, mata kanan keri, apa kaliṅanya, liriṅniṅ mata ri kivan, tūt mata ri təṅən, liriṅ mata ri təṅən tūt mata ri kivan, apa kaliṅanya, yugapat parəṅ gata jātinika. apa ta siniṇḍinika, hədap lavan tutur, apa kaliṅanya, lakuniṅ hədap lakuniṅ tutur, lakuniṅ tutur lakuniṅ hədap, yugapat parəṅ gata jātinika, apa rahinaniṅ vuvus saṅ paṇḍita</foreign>.</note>
1820 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.05" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan
. <app><lem type="norm">kapiṅtiganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapitiganiṁ</rdg></app> tulis,
. <app><lem type="norm">təmbəy</lem><rdg wit="#A">təbəy·</rdg></app> saṅ pandita, maṅucap rahaseya, purva saṅ
1825 <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana, yen <app><lem type="emn">avruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">avraḥ</rdg></app>ny avaknira, ya ta saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> darma visesa, ya ta ləpasnya sakeṅ bvana, luputnya sakeṅ sarira, tan pavak bayu sabda hədap, ṅuniveh sunya taya paramarta lilaṅ hənəṅ niravarana.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_30.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_30.01">SHH 30.1</ref>: <foreign>nihan kapintiganiṅ tulis, təbay saṅ paṇḍita maṅucap rahasya, pūrva saṅ manon vruh ry avaknira ar dharma viśeṣa, ləpasnya sakeṅ bhuvana, luputnya sakeṅ śārīra, tar pakāvak bāyu śabda hədap, ṅuniveh śūnya taya paramārtha, luput an pakāvak ika samaṅkana kabeh pva pinakāvak saṅ manon</foreign>.</note>
1830 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.06" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ya ta sinaṅguh darma ligəṅ haneṅ sarira, nityaksa dumilah
. <app><lem type="emn">kuməñar</lem><rdg wit="#A">kumiñar</rdg></app> tan kapadəman ri rahina kuləm, lavan sakala
. <app><lem type="emn">niskala</lem><rdg wit="#A">naskala</rdg></app>, tinonakən, vastu saṅ pandita,
1835 <app><lem type="emn">nirsandeha</lem><rdg wit="#A">nərsan·deha</rdg></app> ta kita
. <app><lem type="emn">huvus</lem><rdg wit="#A">duhuvus·</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakarasanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkarasanya</rdg></app> ri
. <app><lem type="norm">kapiṅtiganiṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapitiganiṁ</rdg></app> tulis, kayatna-yatna saṅ sevaka darma, liṅ saṅ yogisvara.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
1840 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_30.02"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_30.02">SHH 30.2</ref>: <foreign>ya ta mataṅyan rahasya, ya sinaṅguh dharma haneṅ śārīra, nityaśa dumilah kuməñar tar pakapadəman ri rahineṅ kuləm</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.07" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan sinaṅguh
1845 <app><lem type="norm">kalakar <pb edRef="#A" n="35r"/>pat</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalakaR̥pat·</rdg></app>, ṅa, ka, hurip, pati, turu, biparita, nihan pinakakahanana saṅ manon ri sakala niskala vastu,
. <app><lem type="emn">tinonakən</lem><rdg wit="#A">kinvanakən</rdg><!-- similar --></app> saṅ pandita, ri saṅ sevaka darma.
. </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_31.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_31.01">SHH 31.1</ref>: <foreign>kalakar pat, ṅaranya, hurip pati turu viparīta, nahan pinakapāpa saṅ manon ri niskala vastu, kinvanakən saṅ paṇḍita, kayatnakna ikaṅ saṅ sevaka dharma</foreign>
1850 </note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_44.08" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">sarira ganal ṅaranya, si pati, anon ta kita sarira kiñcit,
. <app><lem type="emn">matra</lem><rdg wit="#A">man·ṭā</rdg></app> sakədap pakatonan, hana ta sarira
1855 <app><lem type="emn">suksma</lem><rdg wit="#A">susəma</rdg></app>, ya ta sinaṅguh turu ṅaranya, iya ikaṅ pinakavakta
. <app><lem type="norm">paṅimpyan</lem><rdg wit="#A">paṅipyin·</rdg></app>, hana sarira lilaṅ, ya ta sinaṅguh viparita ṅaranya, lina sunya taya paramarta, nihan ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">kalakar <pb edRef="#A" n="35r"/>pat</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalakaR̥pat·</rdg></app> ṅaranya, tan avakan ikaṅ saṅ manon, ikaṅ hurip lavan atma, lilaṅ hənəṅ niravarana, laṅgəṅ tuṅgəṅ nirasraya, maṅkana sarvva janma kabeh, ya ta ratuniṅ papa ṅaranya, tan pasarira ratu saṅ manon, ri sakala niskala,
. <app><lem type="norm">pinakarasanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">pinaḥkarasanya</rdg></app> ri
. <app><lem type="norm">kalakar <pb edRef="#A" n="35r"/>pat</lem><rdg wit="#A">kalakaR̥pat·</rdg></app>, ṅa, kayatnakən ika anak<pb edRef="#A" n="35v"/>ku saṅ sevaka darma, liṅ saṅ yogisvara, 4.</p><listApp type="parallels">
1860 <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_31.03"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_31.03">SHH 31.3–5</ref> <foreign>śārīra ganal, ṅaranya si pati, anon ta ya śārīra kiñcit matra sakədap katonanya, lvirnya aṇuh paramāṇuh</foreign> [...] <foreign>hana ta śārīra sūkṣma, ya sinaṅguh turu, ṅaranya, ikaṅ pinakāvakta ri paṅipyan, ikaṅ ta rakutən saṅ manon</foreign> [...] <foreign>hana ta śārīra lilaṅ, ya sinaṅguh viparīta ṅaranya, lina ri śūnyataya paramārtha, maprabhu takas myavasaya samatita ri bāyu leṅgəṅ</foreign>[...].</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
.</div>
1865 <!-- mari saṁsaya ta kita denya, mari meliḥ na<space type="binding-hole"/> ta kita, saṁ hya pramana, manilvalita saṁ hya visesa, ka, tan· na svaga, tar nahala, tar na hayu, tar na su<lb
. n="35v4" break="no"/>ka, tar na duka, Iya ta rasaniṁ pati ṅaranya, katəmvan ikaṁ manivan·, ri sala niskala, Apa ta maryikən·n ika hala, hala hayu, suka duka, ṅəkeri bvana sarira, ṅaniveḥ Ikaṁ sarvvajan·ma kabeḥ
.
.<!-\-SSMG_L621_36r.JPG-\->
.<pb n="36r"/>
1870<lb n="36r1"/>Ana saṁ hyaṁ pramana, juga tan· hana vaneḥ nihan· sinaṁguḥ rahasye pandi ṅaranya, -->
.<div type="chapter" n="45" xml:id="smg_45">
.<head type="editorial">Secret of the Scholar (<foreign>rahasya pandita</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_45.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan sinaṅguh rahasya pandita ṅaranya, apa ta
. <app><lem type="emn">kavistaranya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kavis·tananya</rdg><!-- similar --></app>, nihan hana upadyanta, kady aṅganiṅ saṅ
1875 <app><lem type="emn">manon</lem><rdg wit="#A">manivan·</rdg></app>, ri huvusnikaṅ hayunika saṅ hyaṅ pramana, an ləpasnya sakeṅ bvana, luputnya sakeṅ sarira, makavak laṅgəṅ tutur tələṅniṅ sandi ajñana, apa ta laṅgəṅniṅ tutur tələṅniṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">sandi</lem><rdg wit="#A">sadi</rdg></app> ajñana.
.</p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_32.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_32.01">SHH 32.1</ref>: <foreign>umapa ta lvirnika saṅ manon, ar tiṅgalekən śārīranira, ləpasnya sakeṅ bhuvana, ar pakavak laṅgəṅniṅ tutur təlaniṅ sandhi jñāna</foreign>.</note>
1880 </app>
. </listApp>
.<p xml:id="smg_45.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan artanya, <quote><term xml:lang="san-Latn"><app><lem type="norm">kāṣṭhe kāṣṭhe</lem><rdg wit="#A">kasṭe kasṭe</rdg></app>
. <app><lem type="emn">yathā</lem><rdg wit="#A">ya</rdg></app> <app><lem type="norm">bahniḥ</lem><rdg wit="#A">bahni</rdg></app>,
. <app><lem type="emn">sūkṣmatvān</lem><rdg wit="#A">suksəmatva</rdg></app> nopalabhyate</term></quote>, artanya, tan hana
1885 <app><lem type="norm">kapaṅguhanya</lem><rdg wit="#A">kapaguḥhanya</rdg></app>, mari saṅsaya ta kita denya, mari
. <app><lem type="emn">moli</lem><rdg wit="#A">meliḥna</rdg></app> ta kita, saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> pramana,
. <app><lem type="emn">mari</lem><rdg wit="#A">mani</rdg><!-- similar--></app> lolita saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> visesa.
1890 </p><listApp type="parallels">
. <app>
. <note corresp="txt:SHH_32.01"><ref target="DHARMA_CritEdSangHyangHayu.xml#shh_32.01">SHH 32.1</ref>: <foreign><term xml:lang="san-Latn">kāṣṭhe kāṣṭhe yathā bahniḥ sūkṣmatvān nopalabhyate</term>, iva kady aṅganiṅ apuy haneṅ isyan, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">sūkṣma</term> teka tar katon, <term xml:lang="san-Latn">nopalabhyate</term>, tan hana paṅguhanya, tan panas tan atis, tar hala tar hayu katəmvaniṅ ikaṅ apuy, yadyastun hana hala hayu mvaṅ panas tis ikaṅ ṅapuy, tan sukha tan duhkhanikaṅ apuy ika, sukha duhkhanikaṅ əsyan ika, ya tapva luput ri sukha duhkha, mvaṅ panas tis kapva ikaṅ apuy</foreign>.</note>
. </app>
. </listApp>
1895<p xml:id="smg_45.03">ka, tan na svaga, tar na hala, tar na hayu, tar na suka, tar na duka, iya ta rasaniṅ pati ṅaranya, katəmvan ikaṅ
. <app><lem type="emn">manon</lem><rdg wit="#A">manivan·</rdg></app>, ri
. <app><lem type="emn">sakala</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="eye-skip">sala</rdg></app> niskala, apa ta maryakən ika
. <app><lem type="emn">hala</lem><rdg wit="#A" cause="dittography">hala, hala</rdg></app> hayu, suka duka, ṅkeri bvana sarira, ṅuniveh
. <app><lem type="emn">rikaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">Ikaṁ</rdg></app> sarvva janma kabeh, <pb edRef="#A" n="36r"/>ana saṅ hyaṅ pramana juga tan hana vaneh, nihan sinaṅguh rahasya
1900 <app><lem type="emn">pandita</lem><rdg wit="#A">pandi</rdg></app> ṅaranya, keṅətakna saṅ sevaka darma, liṅ arya pandita, 4.</p>
.</div>
.<div type="chapter" n="46" xml:id="smg_46">
.<head type="editorial">Instruction words (<foreign>sabdopadesa</foreign>)</head>
.<p xml:id="smg_46.01" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">nihan
1905 <app><lem type="emn">sabdopadesa</lem><rdg wit="#A">sabdapadesa</rdg></app> ṅaranya, vəkasniṅ pandita, mari mavuvus ri saṅ sevaka darma, vəkasniṅ mari mavarah ri sisya, saṅ guru, vəkas mari matakon saṅ sisya, ri saṅ guru.</p>
.<p xml:id="smg_46.02" xml:lang="kaw-Latn">ndya nihan<supplied reason="omitted">,</supplied> kady aṅganiṅ manik sapastika, maṅkana ta saṅ pandita, lavan saṅ sevaka darma, yen asampun pada
. <app><lem type="emn">vruh</lem><rdg wit="#A">vraḥ</rdg></app> ri saṅ
. <app><lem type="norm">hyaṅ</lem><rdg wit="#A">hya</rdg></app> darma kabeh,
